都是好题 T1: Merchant二 分 这答案没有单调性还有什么题答案有单调性 重点在check，我最开始用堆写的，但带了个log正好过不去。 后来我想起来了std::nth_element，它是O(n)的也~~~ 然后我挂了。它只会把前m大的放到前m个，并不会排好序。 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long LL;int n, m;LL s, k[1000005], b[1000005], f[1000005];inline LL read() { LL a = 0, b = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 1 : 0, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? -a : a;}bool check(int t) { LL tmp = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) f[i] = k[i] * t + b[i]; std::nth_element(f + 1, f + m, f + n + 1, std::greater<LL>()); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) if (f[i] > 0 && (tmp += f[i]) >= s) return true; return false;}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(), s = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) k[i] = read(), b[i] = read(); if (check(0)) return !printf("0
"); int l = 1, r = 1e9, mid, ans = -1; while (l <= r) { mid = (l + r) >> 1; if (check(mid)) ans = mid, r = mid - 1; else l = mid + 1; } return !printf("%d
", ans);} T2: Equation首先可以顺着边把每个点的解用$k \plusmn x_1$表示。 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long LL;const int N = 3e6 + 233;int n, q, ecnt, num, head[N], dep[N], dfn[N], siz[N];LL w[N], val[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt;} e[N];struct Bit { int t[2][N]; void add(int op, int x, int d) { for (; x <= N; x += x & -x) t[op][x] += d; } int ask(int op, int x) { int ret = 0; for (; x; x -= x & -x) ret += t[op][x]; return ret; }} bit;inline int read() { int a = 0, b = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 1 : 0, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? -a : a;}void addEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}void dfs(int x, int fa) { dep[x] = dep[fa] + 1, w[x] = val[x] - w[fa], dfn[x] = ++num, siz[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa) continue; dfs(y, x); siz[x] += siz[y]; }}signed main() { n = read(), q = read(); for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) { int x = read(); scanf("%lld", &val[i]); addEdge(x, i); } dfs(1, 0); while (q--) { int op = read(); if (op == 1) { int x = read(), y = read(); LL s; scanf("%lld", &s); LL tmp1 = bit.ask(dep[x] & 1, dfn[x]) + w[x]; LL tmp2 = bit.ask(dep[y] & 1, dfn[y]) + w[y]; if ((dep[x] & 1) ^ (dep[y] & 1)) { puts(tmp1 + tmp2 == s ? "inf" : "none"); } else { LL tmp = tmp1 + tmp2; if (dep[x] & 1) { if ((s - tmp) & 1ll) puts("none"); else printf("%lld
", ((s - tmp) >> 1ll)); } else { if ((tmp - s) & 1ll) puts("none"); else printf("%lld
", ((tmp - s) >> 1ll)); } } } else { int x = read(), v = read(), z = v - val[x]; bit.add(dep[x] & 1, dfn[x], z); bit.add(dep[x] & 1, dfn[x] + siz[x], -z); bit.add((dep[x] & 1) ^ 1, dfn[x], -z); bit.add((dep[x] & 1) ^ 1, dfn[x] + siz[x], z); val[x] = v; } } return 0;} T3: Rectangle首先从左往右枚举矩形的右边界，再从右往左枚举该右边界的左边界，[L, R]。 那么矩形们的面积就是$(R - L) * \sum h$。问题在于如何快速算出$\sum h$。 $h = y_{max} - y_{min}$。考虑从下往上枚举$y_{max}$，在左端点那条直线上存在最大的$y_{qaq} \le y_{max}$，而之前扫过的直线中的所有$y_i \in (y_{qaq}, y_{max})$都是有贡献的。小于第一个小于$y_{qaq}$的高度$y_{min}$的点都可以与这些$y_i$产生符合要求的矩形边长。设这种点有s个，只考虑一个y，它产生的边长的和就是$s * y - \sum \limits_{y_i \le y_{min}} y_i$。 把所有符合条件的y产生的边长累加起来，最后每个左边界产生的面积为：$\sum(R - L) (s_{y_i \le y_{min}的数量} \sum \limits_{y_i \in (y_{qaq}, y_{max})} - \sum \limits_{y_i \le y_{min}} y_i * s_{y_i \in (y_{qaq}, y_{max})})$。$y_{max}$是向上枚举得到的。 长度和和数量和都可以用树状数组快速求出。 不开LL会见祖宗的。 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int D = 1e9 + 7;int n, c[2510], pos[2510][2510];bool used[2510];struct Bit { int t[2510]; void add(int x, int d) { for (; x <= 2510; x += x & -x) t[x] += d; } int ask(int x) { int ret = 0; for (; x; x -= x & -x) ret += t[x]; return ret; } void clear() { for (int i = 1; i <= 2510; ++i) t[i] = 0; }} siz, len;inline int read() { int a = 0, b = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 1 : 0, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? -a : a;}void modify(int x) { if (!used[x]) { used[x] = true; siz.add(x, 1), len.add(x, x); }}signed main() { n = read(); for (int i = 1, x, y; i <= n; ++i) x = read(), y = read(), pos[x][++c[x]] = y; for (int i = 1; i <= 2500; ++i) std::sort(pos[i] + 1, pos[i] + 1 + c[i]), pos[i][c[i] + 1] = 2501; long long ans = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= 2500; ++i) { if (!c[i]) continue; siz.clear(), len.clear(); for (int j = 1; j <= 2500; ++j) used[j] = false; for (int j = 1; j <= c[i]; ++j) modify(pos[i][j]); for (int j = i - 1; j; --j) { if (!c[j]) continue; int p1 = 1, p2 = 1, cur = std::max(pos[i][1], pos[j][1]); for (int k = 1; k <= c[j]; ++k) modify(pos[j][k]); while (pos[i][p1 + 1] <= cur) ++p1; while (pos[j][p2 + 1] <= cur) ++p2; while (p1 <= c[i] && p2 <= c[j]) { int mn = std::min(pos[i][p1], pos[j][p2]); int trend = std::min(pos[i][p1 + 1], pos[j][p2 + 1]); (ans += (long long) (i - j) * ((long long) (len.ask(trend - 1) - len.ask(cur - 1)) * siz.ask(mn) - (long long) (siz.ask(trend - 1) - siz.ask(cur - 1)) * len.ask(mn))) %= D; cur = trend; if (pos[i][p1 + 1] <= cur) ++p1; if (pos[j][p2 + 1] <= cur) ++p2; } } } return !printf("%lld
", ans);}

posts.title: hzoi-CSP-55
posts.text:
我好菜，AFO了 联赛题你🐎呢 T1: 联搞清楚tag的运算规律就行了 忘开long long炸了60pts，我哭哭 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130131132133134#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define int long longconst int N = 4e5 + 233;int m, qwq, qaq, askl[N], askr[N], askop[N], lsh[N << 2];struct SegTree { int l, r, tag, cnt;} t[N << 2];inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void build(int p, int l, int r) { t[p].l = l, t[p].r = r, t[p].cnt = r - l + 1, t[p].tag = -1; if (l == r) return; int mid = (l + r) >> 1; build(p << 1, l, mid), build(p << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);}void pushdown(int p) { if (t[p].tag == -1) return; if (t[p].tag == 1) { t[p << 1].tag = t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 1; t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = 0; } else if (t[p].tag == 0) { t[p << 1].tag = t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 0; t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1].r - t[p << 1].l + 1; t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].r - t[p << 1 | 1].l + 1; } else if (t[p].tag == 2) { if (t[p << 1].tag == 2) { t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1].r - t[p << 1].l + 1 - t[p << 1].cnt; t[p << 1].tag = -1; } else if (t[p << 1].tag == -1) { t[p << 1].tag = 2; t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1].r - t[p << 1].l + 1 - t[p << 1].cnt; } else if (t[p << 1].tag == 0) { t[p << 1].tag = 1; t[p << 1].cnt = 0; } else if (t[p << 1].tag == 1) { t[p << 1].tag = 0; t[p << 1].cnt = t[p << 1].r - t[p << 1].l + 1; } if (t[p << 1 | 1].tag == 2) { t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].r - t[p << 1 | 1].l + 1 - t[p << 1 | 1].cnt; t[p << 1 | 1].tag = -1; } else if (t[p << 1 | 1].tag == -1) { t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 2; t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].r - t[p << 1 | 1].l + 1 - t[p << 1 | 1].cnt; } else if (t[p << 1 | 1].tag == 0) { t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 1; t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = 0; } else if (t[p << 1 | 1].tag == 1) { t[p << 1 | 1].tag = 0; t[p << 1 | 1].cnt = t[p << 1 | 1].r - t[p << 1 | 1].l + 1; } } t[p].tag = -1;}void set(int p, int l, int r, int op) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) { if (op == 1) { t[p].cnt = 0; t[p].tag = 1; } else { t[p].cnt = t[p].r - t[p].l + 1; t[p].tag = 0; } return; } pushdown(p); int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; if (l <= mid) set(p << 1, l, r, op); if (r > mid) set(p << 1 | 1, l, r, op); t[p].cnt = t[p << 1].cnt + t[p << 1 | 1].cnt;}void flip(int p, int l, int r) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) { if (t[p].tag == -1) { t[p].tag = 2; t[p].cnt = t[p].r - t[p].l + 1 - t[p].cnt; } else if (t[p].tag == 0) { t[p].tag = 1; t[p].cnt = 0; } else if (t[p].tag == 1) { t[p].tag = 0; t[p].cnt = t[p].r - t[p].l + 1; } else if (t[p].tag == 2) { t[p].tag = -1; t[p].cnt = t[p].r - t[p].l + 1 - t[p].cnt; } return; } pushdown(p); int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; if (l <= mid) flip(p << 1, l, r); if (r > mid) flip(p << 1 | 1, l, r); t[p].cnt = t[p << 1].cnt + t[p << 1 | 1].cnt;}int query(int p) { if (t[p].l == t[p].r) return t[p].l; pushdown(p); if (t[p << 1].cnt) return query(p << 1); else return query(p << 1 | 1);}signed main() { m = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { askop[i] = read(), askl[i] = read(), askr[i] = read(); lsh[++qaq] = askl[i], lsh[++qaq] = askr[i]; lsh[++qaq] = std::max(1ll, askl[i] - 1), lsh[++qaq] = askr[i] + 1; } lsh[++qaq] = 1; std::sort(lsh + 1, lsh + qaq + 1); qwq = std::unique(lsh + 1, lsh + qaq + 1) - lsh - 1; build(1, 1, qwq); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { askl[i] = std::lower_bound(lsh + 1, lsh + 1 + qwq, askl[i]) - lsh; askr[i] = std::lower_bound(lsh + 1, lsh + 1 + qwq, askr[i]) - lsh; if (askop[i] == 1 || askop[i] == 2) set(1, askl[i], askr[i], askop[i]); else flip(1, askl[i], askr[i]); printf("%lld
", lsh[query(1)]); } return 0;} T2: 赛考场上想的已经很接近了，但我打错了。 贪心：最好选价格小的（废话 但是可能会有两人喜欢相同的orz，这部分枚举，剩下的直接贪。 我开了4个数组：都喜欢，只a，只b，都不喜欢。 在考场上我建了4个BIT，贪心选，然后挂了。 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long LL;const int N = 4e5 + 233;int n, m, k, a, b;LL v[N], t0[N], t1[N], t2[N], t3[N], s1[N], s2[N];bool a_like[N], b_like[N];LL ans = (1ll << 62);inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}LL calc(int r) { LL tmp = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= r; ++i) tmp += t0[i]; int have = r, x1 = 1, x2 = 1, x3 = 1, rest = k - r; if (rest > 0) { if (t1[0] < rest || t2[0] < rest) return (1ll << 62); tmp += s1[rest] + s2[rest]; x1 += rest, x2 += rest; have += 2 * rest; } if (have > m) return (1ll << 62); while (have < m) { ++have; LL d1 = (1ll << 62), d2 = (1ll << 62), d3 = (1ll << 62); if (x1 <= t1[0]) d1 = t1[x1]; if (x2 <= t2[0]) d2 = t2[x2]; if (x3 <= t3[0]) d3 = t3[x3]; if (d1 <= d2 && d1 <= d3) { tmp += t1[x1++]; } else if (d2 <= d1 && d2 <= d3) { tmp += t2[x2++]; } else if (d3 <= d1 && d3 <= d2) { tmp += t3[x3++]; } } return tmp;}int main() { n = read(), m = read(), k = read(); if (k > m) return !printf("%d
", -1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) v[i] = read(); a = read(); if (a < k) return !printf("%d
", -1); for (int i = 1; i <= a; ++i) a_like[read()] = true; b = read(); if (b < k) return !printf("%d
", -1); for (int i = 1; i <= b; ++i) b_like[read()] = true; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (a_like[i] && b_like[i]) t0[++t0[0]] = v[i]; else if (a_like[i]) t1[++t1[0]] = v[i]; else if (b_like[i]) t2[++t2[0]] = v[i]; else t3[++t3[0]] = v[i]; } std::sort(t0 + 1, t0 + 1 + t0[0]); std::sort(t1 + 1, t1 + 1 + t1[0]); std::sort(t2 + 1, t2 + 1 + t2[0]); std::sort(t3 + 1, t3 + 1 + t3[0]); for (int i = 1; i <= t1[0]; ++i) s1[i] = s1[i - 1] + t1[i]; for (int i = 1; i <= t2[0]; ++i) s2[i] = s2[i - 1] + t2[i]; for (int i = 0; i <= t0[0]; ++i) ans = std::min(ans, calc(i)); printf("%lld
", ans == (1ll << 62) ? -1 : ans); return 0;} T3: 题1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, ans, u[500005], v[500005];bool qia[405];std::bitset<405> qwq[405];signed main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) scanf("%d%d", u + i, v + i); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { qwq[i][i] = 1; for (int j = m; j; --j) { int x = u[j], y = v[j]; if (qwq[i][x] && qwq[i][y]) { qia[i] = true; break; } qwq[i][x] = qwq[i][y] = qwq[i][x] | qwq[i][y]; } } for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (qia[i]) continue; for (int j = i + 1; j <= n; ++j) { if (qia[j]) continue; if ((qwq[i] & qwq[j]) == 0) ++ans; } } return !printf("%d
", ans);}

posts.title: 点分治
posts.text: 淀粉质好吃 淀粉质事高端暴力。它可以解决树上路径问题。别的用途我还没发现。 原理很简单，把一颗树分成很多子树，分别算出答案，再把答案合并起来。 如果子树大小差距非常极端肯定不好，和暴力没啥区别，选在重心最好（每个子树的大小都不超过树大小的一半） 求答案用到了树形背包的思想，求完一棵子树就把它和之前的子树视为整体。 淀粉质四步： 1.找重心123456789101112void get_root(int x, int fa, int all) { siz[x] = 1; int mx = 0; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y != fa && !vis[y]) { get_root(y, x, all); siz[x] += siz[y], mx = std::max(mx, siz[y]); } } mx = std::max(mx, all - siz[x]); if (mx < maxson) maxson = mx, root = x;} 2. 求距离12345678void get_dis(int x, int fa, int sum) { if (sum > E) return; dis[++dis[0]] = sum; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; get_dis(y, x, sum + e[i].val); }} 3. 算答案123456789101112131415void calc(int x, int fa) { s.insert(0); for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; dis[0] = 0; get_dis(y, x, e[i].val); for (int j = 1; j <= dis[0]; ++j) { IT it = s.lower_bound(S - dis[j]); if (it != s.end() && (*it) + dis[j] <= E) ans = std::min(ans, *it + dis[j]); } for (int j = 1; j <= dis[0]; ++j) s.insert(dis[j]); } s.clear();} 每道题的算答案不同，这是淀粉质在不同题的唯一区别。 这里贴的是我在9.28模拟赛T3的代码。 4.递归函数123456789void dfs(int x, int fa) { maxson = INF; get_root(x, 0, siz[x]); x = root, calc(x, fa), vis[x] = true; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; dfs(y, x); }}

posts.title: SDFZOI-0928
posts.text:
点分治惨遭遗忘 T1: a小球放盒子问题（ 有时间总结一下（咕咕咕？ 相同弹珠放相同盒子可以转化为整数划分。 考虑整数划分。f[i][j] 表示i个弹珠放j个盒子的方案数。显然有两种转移：这一整层都放、有不放的，（顺序不影响方案的不同），有不放的属于子问题。 则有转移方程： f[i][j] = f[i - j][j] + f[i][j - 1] (i >= j); f[i][j] = f[i][j - 1] (i < j). 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344#include <bits/stdc++.h>class Gekoo { public: void solve(); private: void main_input(); int _read(); int n, k; int f[5005][5005];};const int D = 998244353;Gekoo UUZ;int main() { UUZ.solve(); return 0;}int Gekoo::_read() { int a = 0, b = 1; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 0 : 1, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? a : -a;}void Gekoo::main_input() { n = _read(), k = _read(); }void Gekoo::solve() { main_input(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) f[i][1] = 1; for (int i = 1; i <= k; ++i) f[1][i] = f[0][i] = 1; for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 2; j <= k; ++j) if (i >= j) f[i][j] = (f[i - j][j] + f[i][j - 1]) % D; else f[i][j] = f[i][j - 1]; printf("%d
", f[n - k][k]);} T2: c数论题不会证，打表找规律，发现符合条件的数对都满足以下性质： $(x, y) = x - y = x ^ y$. 不要问我为什么，证明找dky（ 那就很简单了，枚举$(x, y)$，对于每个$(x, y)$枚举b，它必然是$(x, y)$的倍数。$x - (x, y)$可以还原出一个y，$(x, y) \oplus x$也可以还原出一个y，对比它们是否相同。 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243#include <bits/stdc++.h>class Gekoo { public: void solve(); private: void main_input(); int _read(); void get_list(); int n; int ans;};Gekoo UUZ;int main() { UUZ.solve(); return 0;}int Gekoo::_read() { int a = 0, b = 1; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) b = c == '-' ? 0 : 1, c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return b ? a : -a;}void Gekoo::main_input() { n = _read(); }void Gekoo::solve() { main_input(); for (int g = 1; g <= n; ++g) { for (int b = 2 * g; b <= n; b += g) { // g = b - a // g ^ b = a if ((g ^ b) == (b - g)) ++ans; } } printf("%d
", ans);} T3: b考场看出淀粉质但我忘了。 这是淀粉质板子，没得说，移步淀粉质复习，请。 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 2e5 + 233, INF = (1 << 30);typedef std::set<int>::iterator IT;int n, S, E;int ecnt, head[N];int ans, root, maxson, siz[N], dis[N];bool vis[N];std::set<int> s;struct Edge { int to, nxt, val;} e[N << 1];inline void addEdge(int f, int to, int val) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f], val}, head[f] = ecnt;}void get_root(int x, int fa, int all) { siz[x] = 1; int mx = 0; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y != fa && !vis[y]) { get_root(y, x, all); siz[x] += siz[y], mx = std::max(mx, siz[y]); } } mx = std::max(mx, all - siz[x]); if (mx < maxson) maxson = mx, root = x;}void get_dis(int x, int fa, int sum) { if (sum > E) return; dis[++dis[0]] = sum; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; get_dis(y, x, sum + e[i].val); }}void calc(int x, int fa) { s.insert(0); for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; dis[0] = 0; get_dis(y, x, e[i].val); for (int j = 1; j <= dis[0]; ++j) { IT it = s.lower_bound(S - dis[j]); if (it != s.end() && (*it) + dis[j] <= E) ans = std::min(ans, *it + dis[j]); } for (int j = 1; j <= dis[0]; ++j) s.insert(dis[j]); } s.clear();}void dfs(int x, int fa) { maxson = INF; get_root(x, 0, siz[x]); x = root, calc(x, fa), vis[x] = true; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa || vis[y]) continue; dfs(y, x); }}signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &S, &E); for (int i = 1, x, y, z; i < n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &z); addEdge(x, y, z), addEdge(y, x, z); } ans = INF, siz[1] = n; dfs(1, 0); printf("%d
", ans == INF ? -1 : ans); return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P2482 [SDOI2010]猪国杀
posts.text:
模拟狂魔第三弹 这题OOP确实好写一点 爆写12KB，写代码3h左右，调试2h左右。。。 其实还是有些不足的，有些需要使用方法的地方直接修改了，而且变量还是放在private里好一些。 代码开头写了点心路历程 应该会写琪露诺的冰雪小屋，那个写完就真该退役了（笑  ver 1.0: 第一次提交，WA 0.// ver 2.0: 第二次提交，修改了牌堆堆顶没有从 1 开始的 bug，WA 10.// ver 3.0: 第三次提交，修改了决斗扣血写反了的bug，WA 30.// ver 4.0: 第四次提交，修改了无懈可击会在首次循环就退出，导致无法使用无懈可击的 Bug，WA 55.// ver 5.0: 第五次提交，修改了在主公获胜后仍然获取 bonus 牌的 bug, WA 85.// ver 6.0: 第六次提交，修改了修改第 3 个 bug 时产生的 bug. 调用扣血方法时用错了对象，AC.#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define IT std::vector<Card>::iteratorstruct Card { char kind; bool free;};class Input { public: void main_input(); void n_m_input(); void status_input(); void heap_input();};class Pig { public: Pig(); // 方法 void start_round(); // 开始新回合 void draw_card(); // 抽牌 void play_card(); // 出牌 void use_card(IT it); // 使用卡牌 bool find_card(char ch); // 找牌 void increase_HP(); // 续命 void decrease_HP(); // 被续 void hurt(Pig &that); // 造成伤害 void pith(Pig &that); // 杀死 void pithed(); // 被杀死 void jump(); // 跳 bool to_be_dead(); // 濒死 void become_antilike(); // 进入类反 void exit_antilike(); // 退出类反 bool accessible(char ch); // 卡牌可用性 int find_kill(); // 寻找杀的人 void kill(Pig &that); // 杀 bool kill_respond(); // 回应杀 int find_duel(); // 寻找决斗对象 void duel(Pig &that); // 决斗 void south_attack(); // 南蛮入侵 bool south_attack_respond(); // 回应南蛮入侵 void arrows_shot(); // 万箭齐发 bool arrows_shot_respond(); // 回应万箭齐发 bool invulnerability(Pig &that); // 无懈可击 bool invulnerability_respond(); // 回应无懈可击 void equip_crossbow(); // 装备诸葛连弩 void unequip_crossbow(); // 卸下诸葛连弩 // 变量 std::vector<Card> hand; // 手牌 int array_index; // 数组下标 char status; // 身份 int HP; // 生命 bool dead; // 挂了 bool crossbow; // 装备了诸葛连弩 bool kill_used; // 出过杀 bool antilike; // 类反 bool jumped; // 跳了};int n, m; // 工 具 人int king; // 主公的下标int anti; // 反猪数int heap_top = 1; // 牌堆顶char winner; // 胜利者char heap[5005]; // 牌堆bool gameover; // 游戏结束Input in; // 读入对象Pig pig[15]; // 猪群const bool debug = false; // 调试入口void print(); // 输出函数signed main() { in.main_input(); if (!anti) { winner = 'M'; print(); return 0; } pig[king].jump(); int pig_now = 0; while (1) { // 主进程 pig_now = pig_now % n + 1; if (pig[pig_now].dead) continue; pig[pig_now].start_round(); if (gameover) { print(); return 0; } }}void print() { printf("%s
", winner == 'M' ? "MP" : "FP"); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (pig[i].dead) puts("DEAD"); else { for (IT it = pig[i].hand.begin(); it != pig[i].hand.end(); ++it) { if (it->free) printf("%c ", it->kind); } puts(""); } }}void Input::n_m_input() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); }void Input::status_input() { char sta[7], tmp; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { scanf("%s", sta); if (sta[0] == 'M') king = i; else if (sta[0] == 'F') ++anti; pig[i].array_index = i; pig[i].status = sta[0]; do { tmp = getchar(); if (isalpha(tmp)) pig[i].hand.push_back((Card){tmp, true}); } while (tmp != '
'); }}void Input::heap_input() { char tmp = getchar(); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { while (!isalpha(tmp)) tmp = getchar(); heap[i] = tmp, tmp = getchar(); }}void Input::main_input() { n_m_input(); status_input(); heap_input(); for (int i = m + 1; i <= 5000; ++i) heap[i] = heap[m];}Pig::Pig() { HP = 4; dead = false; crossbow = false; kill_used = false; antilike = false; jumped = false;}void Pig::draw_card() { hand.push_back((Card){heap[heap_top++], true}); }void Pig::increase_HP() { ++HP; }void Pig::decrease_HP() { --HP; }void Pig::equip_crossbow() { crossbow = true; }void Pig::unequip_crossbow() { crossbow = false; }void Pig::pithed() { dead = true; }void Pig::jump() { jumped = true; }void Pig::become_antilike() { antilike = true; }void Pig::exit_antilike() { antilike = false; }bool Pig::kill_respond() { return find_card('D'); }bool Pig::arrows_shot_respond() { return find_card('D'); }bool Pig::south_attack_respond() { return find_card('K'); }void Pig::start_round() { draw_card(), draw_card(); // 抽两张牌 if (debug) { printf("now its %d's round.
", this->array_index); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; printf("%d %c %d:", pig[i].array_index, pig[i].status, pig[i].HP); for (auto x : pig[i].hand) if (x.free) printf("%c ", x.kind); puts(""); } } play_card(); // 出牌 if (kill_used) kill_used = false;}void Pig::play_card() { bool flag = true; while (flag) { flag = false; for (IT it = hand.begin(); it != hand.end(); ++it) { if (it->free && accessible(it->kind)) { // 可以使用 use_card(it); if (dead || gameover) return; flag = true; it = hand.begin() - 1; } } }}void Pig::use_card(IT it) { char kind = it->kind; int tmp; switch (kind) { case 'P': // 桃 if (debug) { printf("%d eats a peach!
", array_index); } it->free = false; increase_HP(); break; case 'K': // 杀 tmp = find_kill(); if (!tmp) return; if (debug) { printf("%d uses Kill. -> %d
", array_index, pig[tmp].array_index); } it->free = false; kill(pig[tmp]); break; case 'F': // 决斗 tmp = find_duel(); if (!tmp) return; if (debug) { printf("%d uses Duel. -> %d
", array_index, pig[tmp].array_index); } it->free = false; duel(pig[tmp]); break; case 'N': // 南蛮入侵 it->free = false; if (debug) { printf("%d uses South Attack.
", array_index); } south_attack(); break; case 'W': // 万箭齐发 it->free = false; if (debug) { printf("%d uses Arrows.
", array_index); } arrows_shot(); break; case 'Z': // 诸葛连弩 it->free = false; if (debug) { printf("%d uses Crossbow.
", array_index); } equip_crossbow(); break; }}bool Pig::find_card(char ch) { for (IT it = hand.begin(); it != hand.end(); ++it) { if (it->kind == ch && it->free) { if (debug) { printf("%d uses %c
", array_index, it->kind); } it->free = false; return true; } } return false;}void Pig::hurt(Pig &that) { that.decrease_HP(); if (debug) { printf("%d hurts %d. left %d %d HP.
", array_index, that.array_index, that.array_index, that.HP); } if (!that.HP && that.to_be_dead()) { if (debug) { printf("%d killed %d.
", array_index, that.array_index); } this->pith(that); }}void Pig::pith(Pig &that) { that.pithed(); switch (that.status) { case 'M': winner = 'F'; gameover = true; break; case 'F': --anti; if (!anti) { winner = 'M'; gameover = true; return; } draw_card(), draw_card(), draw_card(); break; case 'Z': if (this->status == 'M') { for (IT it = this->hand.begin(); it != this->hand.end(); ++it) it->free = false; this->unequip_crossbow(); } break; }}bool Pig::to_be_dead() { for (IT it = hand.begin(); it != hand.end(); ++it) { if (it->kind == 'P' && it->free) { it->free = false; increase_HP(); return false; } } return true;}bool Pig::accessible(char ch) { switch (ch) { case 'P': if (HP < 4) return true; break; case 'K': if (find_kill()) return true; break; case 'F': if (find_duel()) return true; break; case 'N': return true; break; case 'W': return true; break; case 'Z': return true; break; } return false;}int Pig::find_kill() { if (kill_used && !crossbow) return 0; switch (status) { case 'M': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].antilike || (pig[i].status == 'F' && pig[i].jumped)) return i; else return 0; } break; case 'Z': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].status == 'F' && pig[i].jumped) return i; else return 0; } break; case 'F': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].status != 'F' && pig[i].jumped) return i; else return 0; } break; }}void Pig::kill(Pig &that) { jump(); exit_antilike(); kill_used = true; if (!that.kill_respond()) hurt(that);}int Pig::find_duel() { switch (status) { case 'M': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].antilike || (pig[i].status == 'F' && pig[i].jumped)) return i; } break; case 'Z': for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].status == 'F' && pig[i].jumped) return i; } break; case 'F': return king; break; } return 0;}void Pig::duel(Pig &that) { jump(); if (status == 'F') exit_antilike(); if (invulnerability(that)) return; if (status == 'M' && that.status == 'Z') { hurt(that); return; } int tmp; while (1) { if (!that.find_card('K')) { tmp = 1; break; } if (!find_card('K')) { tmp = 2; break; } } if (tmp == 1) hurt(that); else that.hurt(*this);}void Pig::south_attack() { for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (debug) { printf("%d suffers a South Attack.
", pig[i].array_index); } if (invulnerability(pig[i])) continue; if (!pig[i].south_attack_respond()) { hurt(pig[i]); if (!jumped && pig[i].status == 'M') become_antilike(); if (gameover) return; } }}void Pig::arrows_shot() { for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (invulnerability(pig[i])) continue; if (debug) { printf("%d suffers a Arrow.
", pig[i].array_index); } if (!pig[i].arrows_shot_respond()) { hurt(pig[i]); if (!jumped && pig[i].status == 'M') become_antilike(); if (gameover) return; } }}bool Pig::invulnerability(Pig &that) { if (!that.jumped) { return false; } bool firstloop = true; for (int i = array_index; i != array_index || firstloop; i = i % n + 1) { firstloop = false; if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (pig[i].status == 'M' && that.status == 'F') continue; if (pig[i].status == 'Z' && that.status == 'F') continue; if (pig[i].status == 'F' && that.status == 'M') continue; if (pig[i].status == 'F' && that.status == 'Z') continue; if (pig[i].find_card('J')) { pig[i].jump(); return !pig[i].invulnerability_respond(); } } return false;}bool Pig::invulnerability_respond() { for (int i = array_index % n + 1; i != array_index; i = i % n + 1) { if (pig[i].dead) continue; if (status == 'M' && pig[i].status == 'Z') continue; if (status == 'Z' && pig[i].status == 'M') continue; if (status == 'Z' && pig[i].status == 'Z') continue; if (status == 'F' && pig[i].status == 'F') continue; if (pig[i].find_card('J')) { pig[i].jump(); return !pig[i].invulnerability_respond(); } } return false;}

posts.title: Luogu P1039 [NOIP2003] 侦探推理
posts.text: 模拟狂魔第二弹 其实这题不难，不要被蓝色tag和读入唬住了，用上std::string直接秒了。 枚举星期几和犯罪嫌疑人，在每一天判断某人说的是不是真话，开个fake数组记一下就行了。 实名谴责读入最后有\r的屑数据。 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, p, f[1003], error, fake[1003], cri;std::string name[1003], speaker, evid[1003];std::string qwq[10] = {"Tony Ma", "Today is Sunday.", "Today is Monday.", "Today is Tuesday.", "Today is Wednesday.", "Today is Thursday.", "Today is Friday.", "Today is Saturday.",};void judge(int x, int reality) { if (fake[x] && reality != fake[x]) error = 1; else fake[x] = reality;}signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &m, &n, &p); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) std::cin >> name[i]; for (int i = 1; i <= p; ++i) { std::cin >> speaker; speaker.erase(speaker.end() - 1); for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) if (speaker == name[j]) f[i] = j; getline(std::cin, evid[i]); evid[i].erase(evid[i].begin()); evid[i].erase(evid[i].end() - 1); } for (int day = 1; day <= 7; ++day) { for (int crime = 1; crime <= m; ++crime) { error = 0; memset(fake, 0, sizeof fake); for (int i = 1; i <= p; ++i) { int from = f[i]; if (evid[i] == "I am guilty.") { judge(from, crime == from ? 2 : 1); } else if (evid[i] == "I am not guilty.") { judge(from, crime != from ? 2 : 1); } for (int j = 1; j <= 7; ++j) if (qwq[j] == evid[i]) judge(from, j == day ? 2 : 1); for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) { if (j == from) continue; if (evid[i] == name[j] + " is guilty.") judge(from, crime == j ? 2 : 1); if (evid[i] == name[j] + " is not guilty.") judge(from, crime != j ? 2 : 1); } } if (error) continue; int lie = 0, truth = 0, idk = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { if (fake[i] == 2) ++truth; else if (fake[i] == 1) ++lie; else ++idk; } if (lie <= n && lie + idk >= n) { if (cri) { if (cri != crime) { return !printf("Cannot Determine\n"); } } else cri = crime; } } } if (cri) std::cout << name[cri] << "\n"; else puts("Impossible"); return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P1027 [NOIP2001] Car的旅行路线
posts.text: 计算几何（确信 恶心的建图，出来后跑Floyd就vans了 唯一的难点在于建图(D区 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475#include <bits/stdc++.h>const double eps = 0.000001;struct City { std::pair<int, int> airport[5]; int t;} c[233];double f[233][233];double distance(std::pair<int, int> a, std::pair<int, int> b) { return sqrt((a.first - b.first) * (a.first - b.first) + (a.second - b.second) * (a.second - b.second));}inline void AddEdge(int from, int to, double val) { f[from][to] = f[to][from] = val;}signed main() { int T; std::cin >> T; while (T--) { int s, a, b; double t; std::cin >> s >> t >> a >> b; for (int i = 1; i <= s; i++) { for (int j = 1; j <= 3; j++) std::cin >> c[i].airport[j].first >> c[i].airport[j].second; double e_1 = distance(c[i].airport[1], c[i].airport[2]); double e_2 = distance(c[i].airport[1], c[i].airport[3]); double e_3 = distance(c[i].airport[2], c[i].airport[3]); if (fabs(e_1 * e_1 + e_2 * e_2 - e_3 * e_3) <= eps) { c[i].airport[4].first = c[i].airport[2].first + c[i].airport[3].first - c[i].airport[1].first; c[i].airport[4].second = c[i].airport[2].second + c[i].airport[3].second - c[i].airport[1].second; } else if (fabs(e_1 * e_1 + e_3 * e_3 - e_2 * e_2) <= eps) { c[i].airport[4].first = c[i].airport[1].first + c[i].airport[3].first - c[i].airport[2].first; c[i].airport[4].second = c[i].airport[1].second + c[i].airport[3].second - c[i].airport[2].second; } else if (fabs(e_2 * e_2 + e_3 * e_3 - e_1 * e_1) <= eps) { c[i].airport[4].first = c[i].airport[1].first + c[i].airport[2].first - c[i].airport[3].first; c[i].airport[4].second = c[i].airport[1].second + c[i].airport[2].second - c[i].airport[3].second; } std::cin >> c[i].t; } for (int i = 1; i <= s; i++) for (int j = i + 1; j <= s; j++) for (int x = 1; x <= 4; x++) for (int y = 1; y <= 4; y++) AddEdge(i * 10 + x, j * 10 + y, t * distance(c[i].airport[x], c[j].airport[y])); for (int i = 1; i <= s; i++) { AddEdge(i * 10 + 1, i * 10 + 2, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[1], c[i].airport[2])); AddEdge(i * 10 + 2, i * 10 + 3, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[2], c[i].airport[3])); AddEdge(i * 10 + 3, i * 10 + 4, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[3], c[i].airport[4])); AddEdge(i * 10 + 4, i * 10 + 1, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[4], c[i].airport[1])); AddEdge(i * 10 + 1, i * 10 + 3, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[1], c[i].airport[3])); AddEdge(i * 10 + 2, i * 10 + 4, c[i].t * distance(c[i].airport[2], c[i].airport[4])); } for (int k = 11; k <= 10 * s + 4; k++) { if (k % 10 == 5) k = 10 * (k / 10 + 1) + 1; for (int i = 11; i <= 10 * s + 4; i++) { if (i % 10 == 5) i = 10 * (i / 10 + 1) + 1; for (int j = 11; j <= 10 * s + 4; j++) { if (j % 10 == 5) j = 10 * (j / 10 + 1) + 1; if (f[i][k] + f[k][j] != 0) f[i][j] = std::min(f[i][k] + f[k][j], f[i][j]); } } } double ans = 23333333; for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) for (int j = 1; j <= 4; j++) ans = std::min(ans, f[a * 10 + i][b * 10 + j]); printf("%.1lf\n", ans); memset(f, 0, sizeof(f)); memset(c, 0, sizeof(c)); } return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P3952 [NOIP2017] 时间复杂度
posts.text: 我很喜欢模拟题（确信 用栈来存语句，出现有效的循环嵌套就++次数，与给出的次数判断。 ERR出现的条件是：循环没有End || 变量名重复 说的很简单，写起来就不一定了（笑 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849#include <bits/stdc++.h>using std::cin;using std::string;signed main() { int T; cin >> T; while (T--) { int L, O_giv = 0, stop = 0, O_max = 0, O_now = 0; string tmp; bool used[233] = {}, error = 0, looping[233] = {}; std::stack<int> s; cin >> L >> tmp; getline(cin, tmp); O_giv = tmp[2] == '1' ? 0 : isdigit(tmp[5]) ? (tmp[4] - '0') * 10 + tmp[5] - '0' : tmp[4] - '0'; for (int i = 1; i <= L; i++) { string opt; getline(cin, opt); if (error) continue; if (opt[0] == 'F') { if (used[opt[2]]) { error = 1; continue; } if (stop) { s.push(0); continue; } s.push(opt[2]); used[opt[2]] = 1; if (opt[opt.size() - 1] == 'n') { if (opt[4] != 'n') { O_max = std::max(O_max, ++O_now); looping[s.top()] = 1; } } else { if (opt[4] == 'n') stop = s.top(); else { int i = isdigit(opt[5]) ? (opt[4] - '0') * 10 + opt[5] - '0' : opt[4] - '0'; int j = isdigit(opt[opt.size() - 2]) ? (opt[opt.size() - 2] - '0') * 10 + opt[opt.size() - 1] - '0' : opt[opt.size() - 1] - '0'; if (i > j) stop = s.top(); } } } else { if (s.empty()) {error = 1; continue;} else if (!s.empty() && s.top() == stop) stop = 0; O_now -= looping[s.top()], looping[s.top()] = 0; used[s.top()] = 0; s.pop(); } } puts((error || !s.empty()) ? "ERR" : O_max == O_giv ? "Yes" : "No"); } return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P2668 [NOIP2015] 斗地主
posts.text: 水题 以前感觉特别难，其实就是迫真大%你 贪心： 出牌优先级：顺子 > 带牌 > 对子 > 单牌 扫出来顺子，扫出来带牌，剩下的就是对子或单牌，直接加上去。 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130131132133134#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int T, n, ans;int card[20];inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void dfs(int dep) { if (dep >= ans) return; //---走顺子--- //单顺子 int k = 0; for (int i = 3; i <= 14; ++i) { if (!card[i]) { k = 0; continue; } if (++k >= 5) { for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) --card[j]; dfs(dep + 1); for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) ++card[j]; } } //双顺子 k = 0; for (int i = 3; i <= 14; ++i) { if (card[i] <= 1) { k = 0; continue; } if (++k >= 3) { for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) card[j] -= 2; dfs(dep + 1); for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) card[j] += 2; } } //三顺子 k = 0; for (int i = 3; i <= 14; ++i) { if (card[i] <= 2) { k = 0; continue; } if (++k >= 2) { for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) card[j] -= 3; dfs(dep + 1); for (int j = i; j >= i - k + 1; --j) card[j] += 3; } } //带牌 for (int i = 2; i <= 14; ++i) { //带不起 if (card[i] <= 2) { continue; } card[i] -= 3; //三带一 for (int j = 2; j <= 15; ++j) { if (j == i || !card[j]) continue; --card[j]; dfs(dep + 1); ++card[j]; } //三带二 for (int j = 2; j <= 15; ++j) { if (j == i || card[j] <= 1) continue; card[j] -= 2; dfs(dep + 1); card[j] += 2; } card[i] += 3; if (card[i] == 4) { card[i] -= 4; //四带二单牌 for (int j = 2; j <= 15; ++j) { if (j == i || !card[j]) continue; --card[j]; for (int k = 2; k <= 15; ++k) { if (k == j || !card[k]) continue; --card[k]; dfs(dep + 1); ++card[k]; } ++card[j]; } //四带二对子 for (int j = 2; j <= 14; ++j) { if (j == i || card[j] < 2) continue; card[j] -= 2; for (int k = 2; k <= 14; ++k) { if (k == j || card[k] < 2) continue; card[k] -= 2; dfs(dep + 1); card[k] += 2; } card[j] += 2; } //四带二王 if (card[15] == 2) { card[15] -= 2; dfs(dep + 1); card[15] += 2; } card[i] += 4; } } for (int i = 2; i <= 15; ++i) if (card[i]) ++dep; ans = std::min(ans, dep);}signed main() { T = read(), n = read(); while (T--) { memset(card, 0, sizeof card); ans = INF; for (int i = 1, a; i <= n; ++i) { a = read(), read(); if (a == 1) ++card[14]; else if (a == 0) ++card[15]; else ++card[a]; } dfs(0); printf("%d\n", ans); } return 0;}

posts.title: sdfzoi-0921
posts.text:
Orz T1: queue要求字典序最小，可以把人按身高降序排序，这样每个人都可以被放在区间[b_i, i - b_i - 1]内（左右端点不一定是这个顺序），那么直接insert到min(b_i, i - b_i - 1)就完事了。判定impossible的条件是第二个<0了，那么之前就不能有$b_i$个人了。 12345678910111213141516171819202122#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n;std::pair<int, int> qwq[100005];std::vector<int> dkykimo;bool cmp (const std::pair<int, int> a, const std::pair<int, int> b) { return a.first > b.first;}signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%d%d", &qwq[i].first, &qwq[i].second); std::sort(qwq + 1, qwq + 1 + n, cmp); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { int qaq = std::min(qwq[i].second, i - 1 - qwq[i].second); if (qaq < 0) return !printf("impossible"); dkykimo.insert(dkykimo.begin() + qaq, qwq[i].first); } for (auto i : dkykimo) printf("%d ", i); return !printf("
");} T2: prime线性筛里把两个质因子的积记一下，再前缀和。 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 10000000;int Q, L, R, f[N+7], pri[N+7];bool vis[N+7];void init() { for (int i = 2; i <= N; ++i) { if (!vis[i]) pri[++pri[0]] = i, f[i] = 1; f[i] += f[i-1]; for (int j = 1; j <= pri[0] && i * pri[j] <= N; ++j) { if (!vis[i]) f[i*pri[j]] = 1; vis[i*pri[j]] = 1; if (i % pri[j] == 0) break; } }}signed main() { init(); scanf("%d", &Q); while (Q--) { scanf("%d%d", &L, &R); printf("%d
", f[R] - f[L-1]); } return 0;} T3: articlehash。 没了 有了 单hash刚刚对拍的时候撞了。。。改成双hash 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long LL;const LL D1 = 1e9 + 7, D2 = 998244353, base1 = 131, base2 = 31;int n, m;LL hash1, hash2, b1[200005], b2[200005];char s[200005];std::set<std::pair<LL, LL>> qwq;signed main() { scanf("%d%d%s", &n, &m, s + 1); b1[0] = b2[0] = 1; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) b1[i] = b1[i-1] * base1 % D1, b2[i] = b2[i-1] * base2 % D2; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) hash1 = (hash1 * base1 % D1 + s[i] - 'a') % D1, hash2 = (hash2 * base2 % D2 + s[i] - 'a') % D2; qwq.insert(std::make_pair(hash1, hash2)); for (int i = m + 1; i <= n; ++i) { hash1 = ((hash1 - (s[i-m] - 'a') * b1[m-1] % D1 + D1) * base1 + s[i] - 'a') % D1; hash2 = ((hash2 - (s[i-m] - 'a') * b2[m-1] % D2 + D2) * base2 + s[i] - 'a') % D2; qwq.insert(std::make_pair(hash1, hash2)); } return !printf("%d
", (int) qwq.size());}

posts.title: Luogu P1070 [NOIP-pj 2009] 道路游戏
posts.text: qwq 可以立刻写出一个$O(N^3)$的柿子： $f[i] = max(f[i-k] + sum[i][j] - sum[i-k][j-k] - cost[i-k]) = max(f[i-k] - sum[i-k][j-k] - cost[i-k]) + sum[i][j]$ 好像可以过了，但不珂学qwq 可以发现是在对角线上进行一个滑动窗口式的转移，开n个单调队列优化DP。 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 1005;int n, m, p, f[N], sum[N][N], cost[N];std::deque<std::pair<int, int>> q[N];inline int upper(int x) { return (x % n + n) % n; }signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &p); for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) scanf("%d", &sum[i][j]); for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) scanf("%d", &cost[i]); for (int i = 2; i <= m; ++i) for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) sum[j][i] += sum[upper(j - 1)][i-1]; for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) q[upper(i + 1)].push_back(std::make_pair(-cost[i], 0)); for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) f[i] = -1145141919; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) f[i] = std::max(f[i], q[upper(j - i + 1)].front().first + sum[upper(j - 1)][i]); for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) { while (!q[upper(j - i + 1)].empty() && i - q[upper(j - i + 1)].front().second >= p) q[upper(j - i + 1)].pop_front(); int d = f[i] - sum[upper(j - 1)][i] - cost[j]; while (!q[upper(j - i + 1)].empty() && q[upper(j - i + 1)].back().first <= d) q[upper(j - i + 1)].pop_back(); q[upper(j - i + 1)].push_back(std::make_pair(d, i)); } } return !printf("%d\n", f[m]);}

posts.title: hzoi-CSP-48
posts.text:
还可以 T1: String Master这数据范围，直接$O(N^3)$秒了，8说了 123456789101112131415161718#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, limit, ans;char s[505], t[505];signed main() { scanf("%d%d%s%s", &n, &limit, s + 1, t + 1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) { int change = 0; for (int k = 1; k <= std::min(n - i + 1, n - j + 1); ++k) { if (s[i+k-1] != t[j+k-1] && ++change > limit) break; ans = std::max(ans, k); } } } return !printf("%d
", ans);} T2:Tourist Attractions对于a-b-c-d，考虑枚举b-c，总数即为：$\sum (degree_b - 1)(degree_c - 1) - cir_{(b, c)}$.其中$cir_{(b,c)}$表示bc形成三元环的个数。 这个数据范围三元环计数可以用bitset直接搞。$cir_{(b, c)} = b_b \& b_c.count()$. 123456789101112131415161718192021#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 1505;int n;long long ans, cnt[N];std::bitset<N> b[N];signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1, x; i <= n; ++i) { for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) { scanf("%1d", &x); b[i][j] = x, cnt[i] += x; } } for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) if (b[i][j]) ans += (cnt[i] - 1) * (cnt[j] - 1) - (b[i] & b[j]).count(); return !printf("%lld
", ans);} T3: Walk对于每个点i，向所有权值为$val_i$子集的点连边。 直接建会死。可以开$2^20$个虚点，让每个点向权值子集连边。 建边后边好像有丶小多，边不用真的建出来，bfs求dis。 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int P = (1 << 20), Q = (P << 1) + 233;int n, m, acnt, bcnt, dis[Q], heada[Q], headb[Q];struct Edge { int to, nxt;} a[Q], b[Q];std::queue<int> q;inline void adda(int f, int to) { a[++acnt] = {to, heada[f]}, heada[f] = acnt;}inline void addb(int f, int to) { b[++bcnt] = {to, headb[f]}, headb[f] = bcnt;}inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void rushB(int x, int d) { if (dis[x] >= 0) return; dis[x] = d; q.push(x); for (int i = headb[x], y = b[i].to; i; i = b[i].nxt, y = b[i].to) rushB(y, d); if (x > P) return; for (int i = 0; i < 20; ++i) if (x & (1 << i)) rushB(x ^ (1 << i), d);}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { int x = read(); adda(i + P, x), addb(x, i + P); } for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { int x = read(), y = read(); adda(x + P, y + P); } for (int i = 1; i <= n + P; ++i) dis[i] = -1; rushB(1 + P, 0); while (!q.empty()) { int x = q.front(); q.pop(); for (int i = heada[x], y = a[i].to; i; i = a[i].nxt, y = a[i].to) rushB(y, dis[x] + 1); } for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf("%d
", dis[i+P]); return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P2831 [NOIP 2016] 愤怒的小鸟
posts.text: 状压DP 两只猪确定一个抛物线。首先明确：使用抛物线进行转移。 $f_{S|parabola_i} = min(f_{S|parabola_i}, f_S + 1)$. 只需要预处理抛物线。两只猪可以确定一个抛物线，再枚举找出在抛物线上的猪的集合。 两点确定抛物线参数： $a = \frac{x_2y_1 - x_1y_2}{x_1x_2(x_1-x_2)}$ $b = \frac{x_1^2y_2 - x_2^2y_1}{x_1x_2(x_1 - x_2)}$. 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142#include <bits/stdc++.h>int T, n, m, parabola[23333], f[1 << 18];double x[20], y[20], a, b;inline void calc(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2){ a = (x2 * y1 - x1 * y2) / (x1 * x2 * (x1 - x2)); b = (x1 * x1 * y2 - x2 * x2 * y1) / (x1 * x2 * (x1 - x2));}inline bool onParabola(double a, double b, double x, double y) { return fabs(a * x * x + b * x - y) <= 0.000001;}signed main() { scanf("%d", &T); while (T--) { memset(f, 0x3f, sizeof f); parabola[0] = 0; scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%lf%lf", x + i, y + i); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { parabola[++parabola[0]] = (1 << (i - 1)); for (int j = i + 1, vis = 0; j <= n; ++j) { if (vis & (1 << (j - 1))) continue; calc(x[i], y[i], x[j], y[j]); if (a >= 0) continue; parabola[++parabola[0]] = (1 << (i - 1)); for (int k = j; k <= n; ++k) if (onParabola(a, b, x[k], y[k])) vis |= (1 << (k - 1)), parabola[parabola[0]] |= (1 << (k - 1)); } } f[0] = 0; for (int i = 0; i <= (1 << n) - 1; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= parabola[0]; ++j) f[i|parabola[j]] = std::min(f[i|parabola[j]], f[i] + 1); printf("%d\n", f[(1<<n)-1]); } return 0;}

posts.title: hzoi-CSP-44
posts.text:
跪了 T1: D容易想到，固定端点r向左移动l，[l, r]的gcd一定是单调递减的，而且值很少。每个gcd都可以覆盖一段区间。 维护一个单调数组，存每个gcd对应的左端点，这样就可以向香港记者一样跑的很快。 每次一边更新答案一边更新数组。 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, a[100005];long long ans = -1;std::pair<int, int> qwq[100005];int gcd(int x, int y) { return y == 0 ? x : gcd(y, x % y);}signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &a[i]); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { ans = std::max(ans, (long long) a[i]); qwq[i] = std::make_pair(i, a[i]); for (int g = a[i], j = i - 1, k = i; j; j = qwq[j].first - 1) { g = gcd(g, a[j]); ans = std::max(ans, (long long) (i - qwq[j].first + 1) * g); if (g == qwq[k].second) qwq[k].first = qwq[j].first; else k = j; qwq[j].second = g; } } return !printf("%lld
", ans);} T2: E分为两种情况：最大值和最小值在不同颜色和相同颜色。 只写了第一种，样例都过不去，居然过了，，， 应该有个完整版，但是我鸽了。 1234567891011121314#include <bits/stdc++.h>int mx = -1, mn = 0x3f3f3f3f, a = 0x3f3f3f3f, b = -1, x[100005], y[100005];signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &x[i], &y[i]); if (x[i] > y[i]) std::swap(x[i], y[i]); mx = std::max(y[i], mx), mn = std::min(mn, x[i]); a = std::min(x[i], a), b = std::max(y[i], b); } return !printf("%lld
", (long long) abs(mx - a) * (long long) abs(mn - b));} T3: F两个端点其中有一个必然是上次的端点。钦定一个，设f[i][j]为进行了i次操作，一个端点在j。 有两种转移，一种是从j转移到现在的端点$p_i$，一种是由上次的端点转移到现在的端点。 $f[i][p_i] \leftarrow \min (f[i-1][k] + dis(k, p_i))$ $f[i][j] \leftarrow f[i-1][j] + dis(p_i, p_{i-1})$ 看到区间找min，可以线段树优化. 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081#include <bits/stdc++.h>typedef long long ll;const int N = 1000005;const ll INF = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;int n, q, a, b, p[N];struct SegTree { int l, r; ll min1, min2, tag;} t[N << 2];void build(int p, int l, int r) { t[p].l = l, t[p].r = r, t[p].min1 = t[p].min2 = INF, t[p].tag = 0; if (l == r) return; int mid = (l + r) >> 1; build(p << 1, l, mid), build(p << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);}void pushdown(int p) { if (!t[p].tag) return; t[p<<1].tag += t[p].tag, t[p<<1|1].tag += t[p].tag; t[p<<1].min1 += t[p].tag, t[p<<1|1].min1 += t[p].tag; t[p<<1].min2 += t[p].tag, t[p<<1|1].min2 += t[p].tag; t[p].tag = 0;}void change(int p, int x, ll o) { if (t[p].l == t[p].r) { t[p].min1 = std::min(t[p].min1, o - t[p].l); t[p].min2 = std::min(t[p].min2, o + t[p].l); return; } int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; pushdown(p); if (x <= mid) change(p << 1, x, o); else change(p << 1 | 1, x, o); t[p].min1 = std::min(t[p<<1].min1, t[p<<1|1].min1); t[p].min2 = std::min(t[p<<1].min2, t[p<<1|1].min2);}ll query1(int p, int l, int r) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) return t[p].min1; int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; ll ret = INF; pushdown(p); if (l <= mid) ret = std::min(ret, query1(p << 1, l, r)); if (r > mid) ret = std::min(ret, query1(p << 1 | 1, l, r)); return ret;}ll query2(int p, int l, int r) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) return t[p].min2; int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; ll ret = INF; pushdown(p); if (l <= mid) ret = std::min(ret, query2(p << 1, l, r)); if (r > mid) ret = std::min(ret, query2(p << 1 | 1, l, r)); return ret;}ll query(int p) { if (t[p].l == t[p].r) return (t[p].min2 - t[p].l); pushdown(p); return std::min(query(p << 1), query(p << 1 | 1));}signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &q, &a, &b); for (int i = 1; i <= q; ++i) scanf("%d", p + i); build(1, 1, n); p[0] = a; change(1, b, 0); for (int i = 1; i <= q; ++i) { ll qwq = std::min(query1(1, 1, p[i]) + p[i], query2(1, p[i], n) - p[i]); t[1].tag += abs(p[i] - p[i-1]); t[1].min1 += abs(p[i] - p[i-1]); t[1].min2 += abs(p[i] - p[i-1]); change(1, p[i-1], qwq); } printf("%lld
", query(1)); return 0;}

posts.title: sdfzoi-0914
posts.text:
弱 Gekoo 弱 T1: 购物Luogu P3045 牛券 可回退的贪心 开三个堆 heap_p, heap_q, g2r. 分别存p[i], q[i], p[i] - q[i]. g2r用来反悔，选了代表撤销之前的一个选择. 套路Orz 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, k, ans; long long m;int p[50005], q[50005];bool trash[50005];struct Node { int cash, id; friend bool operator <(Node a, Node b) { return a.cash > b.cash; }};std::priority_queue<Node> heap_p, heap_q;std::priority_queue<int, std::vector<int>, std::greater<int> > g2r;signed main() { scanf("%d%d%lld", &n, &k, &m); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &p[i], &q[i]); heap_p.push((Node) {p[i], i}), heap_q.push((Node) {q[i], i}); } for (int i = 1; i <= k; ++i) g2r.push(0); while (m > 0 && ans < n) { while (trash[heap_p.top().id]) heap_p.pop(); while (trash[heap_q.top().id]) heap_q.pop(); if (heap_q.top().cash + g2r.top() < heap_p.top().cash) { Node x = heap_q.top(); m -= x.cash + g2r.top(), g2r.pop(); if (m < 0) break; g2r.push(p[x.id] - q[x.id]); trash[x.id] = true, heap_q.pop(); } else { Node x = heap_p.top(); m -= x.cash; if (m < 0) break; trash[x.id] = true, heap_p.pop(); } ++ans; } return !printf("%d
", ans);} T2: 拆网线贪心。 选四个有两种选法：选同一个子树或者选两个点对。 前者要3条边，后者只要2条。 所以点对选的越多越优。 把树上所有能选的点对都选了，如果还有剩的就直接加上。 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 100005;int T, n, k, ecnt, ans;int head[N], qaq[N];bool vis[N];struct Edge { int to, nxt; } e[N << 1];inline void addEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void dfs(int x, int fa) { for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) if (y != fa) dfs(y, x); qaq[++qaq[0]] = x;}signed main() { T = read(); while (T--) { memset(head, 0, sizeof(head)); memset(vis, 0, sizeof(vis)); qaq[0] = ecnt = ans = 0; n = read(), k = read(); for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) { int x = read(); addEdge(i, x), addEdge(x, i); } dfs(1, 0); for (int i = 1; i <= qaq[0] && k > 1; i++) { int x = qaq[i]; if (vis[x]) continue; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y != x && !vis[y]) { vis[x] = vis[y] = 1; ++ans, k -= 2; break; } } } printf("%d
", ans + k); } return 0;} T3: 密室实名谴责pdf把数据范围写漏了 显然可以状压钥匙 直接跑边为1的spfa，可以转移的条件还有$(key_{now}\ \& \ key_{edge}) == key_{edge}$. 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, k, ecnt, ans = 0x3f3f3f3f;int exist[5005], head[5005], dis[5005][1030];struct Portal { int to, nxt, key;} p[10005];inline void link(int f, int to, int key) { p[++ecnt] = {to, head[f], key}, head[f] = ecnt;}inline int read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void spfa() { memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof(dis)); std::queue<std::pair<int, int> > q; q.push(std::make_pair(1, exist[1])); dis[1][exist[1]] = 0; while (!q.empty()) { int x = q.front().first, key = q.front().second; q.pop(); for (int i = head[x], y = p[i].to; i; i = p[i].nxt, y = p[i].to) { if ((key & p[i].key) == p[i].key && dis[y][exist[y]|key] > dis[x][key] + 1) { dis[y][exist[y]|key] = dis[x][key] + 1; if (y == n) ans = std::min(ans, dis[y][exist[y]|key]); q.push(std::make_pair(y, exist[y] | key)); } } }}signed main() { n = read(), m = read(), k = read(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) exist[i] |= read() << j; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { int x = read(), y = read(), key = 0; for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) key |= read() << j; link(x, y, key); } spfa(); if (ans == 0x3f3f3f3f) puts("No Solution"); else printf("%d
", ans); return 0;}

posts.title: hzoi-CSP-7
posts.text:
考爆了，爆零，GG. T1:方程的解一眼Exgcd,求出最小解，再求出所有解。 然而Exgcd忘了，面向数据范围编程，特判少了，40分滚粗。 这题要特判的太多了。。。 要注意特判0 要注意特判符号 要注意特判有无正整数解 大体来说就是这3条，关于符号的问题，Exgcd肯定要正数，可以先把负数标记一下，取相反数，Exgcd后再改回来。 关于Exgcd，有必要再证明一下。。。 已知不定方程$ax + by = c$,首先由某不记得名字的推论(裴蜀定理)，它有解的必要条件为 $(a, b) | c$. 我们设$g = (a, b)$，先求解$ax + by = g$. 因为$(a, b) = (b, a \% b), a \% b = a - b \lfloor  rac{a}{b} floor$ ，所以 $bx + (a - b \lfloor  rac{a}{b} floor)y = g$.即：$ay + b(x - \lfloor  rac{a}{b} floor y) = g$. 可得原方程一组解 $x_1 = y, y_1 = x - \lfloor  rac{a}{b} floor y$. 而$c = kg$,我们令该不定方程两边同乘$k$得 $ax_0 + by_0 = c$, 其中$x_0 = kx_1, y_0 = ky_1$. 这是原方程的一组特解。要获得同解，我们让$x + \Delta x, y + \Delta y$. $a(x_0 + \Delta x) + b (y_0 + \Delta y) = c$.为使方程平衡，$a \Delta x = b \Delta y$. 所以$\Delta x =  rac{b}{g}, \Delta y =  rac{a}{g}$. 原方程同解为$x = x_0 + t  rac{b}{g}, y = y_0 - t  rac{a}{g}, t \in Z $. 求出刚好大于0的y，求出刚好大于0的x对应的最大y，差值除以步长$ rac{a}{g}$再+1就是答案。 本题过于难调，$Have\ fun\ debugging!$ （逃 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define ll long longll Exgcd(ll a, ll b, ll &x, ll &y) { if (b == 0) { x = 1, y = 0; return a; } ll r = Exgcd(b, a % b, y, x); y -= (a / b) * x; return r;}ll Solve(ll a, ll b, ll c) { bool opa = 0, opb = 0; if (a == 0 && b == 0) return c == 0 ? -1 : 0; if (a == 0) return (c == 0 || (c % b == 0 && c / b > 0)) ? -1 : 0; if (b == 0) return (c == 0 || (c % a == 0 && c / a > 0)) ? -1 : 0; if (c < 0) a = -a, b = - b, c = -c; if (a < 0) a = -a, opa = 1; if (b < 0) b = -b, opb = 1; ll x, y; ll g = Exgcd(a, b, x, y); if (c % g != 0) return 0; ll t = c / g; x *= t, y *= t, a /= g, b /= g, c = t; if (opa) a = -a, x = -x; if (opb) b = -b, y = -y; if (a < 0) a = -a, b = -b, c = -c; if (a * b < 0) return -1; x %= b; while (x <= 0) x += b; y = (c - a * x) / b; if (y < 0) return 0; ll y_min = y % a; while (y_min <= 0) y_min += a; return y_min <= y ? (y - y_min) / a + 1 : 0;}signed main() { int T; scanf("%d", &T); while (T--) { ll a, b, c; scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &a, &b, &c); ll ans = Solve(a, b, c); if (ans == -1 || ans > 65535) puts("ZenMeZheMeDuo"); else printf("%lld
", ans); }} T2:Visit最开始T2是树上染色，疯狂码，结果换题了，郁闷。。。。 有一个显然的$O(N^3)$暴力，不提了 算了一下后发现四个方向的次数知1求3，想到枚举其中一个方向，这是就是一个简单的组合计数。 可以发现图形在四个象限没有区别，n和m取abs.设向上为a，向下为b，向右为c，向左为d。 那么总方案数为$C_T^a C_{T - a}^b C_{T - a - b} ^ c C_{T - a - b - c} ^ d$，最后一项为1，化简为$C_T^a C_{T - a}^b * C_{T - a - b} ^ c$,发现和d没啥关系。 $a - b = m$.所以$b = a - m$.又因为$a + c - b - d = n + m, a + c + b + d = t$,所以$2(a + c) = t + n + m$。所以$c =  rac{t + n + m - 2a}{2}$. 然后读错数据范围，以为60%的数据模数为质数，开始狂写质因数分解求组合数，码码码码码。结果不知道咋回事调不出来，GG。T3也没时间写了。。。随便写了一下暴力，结果着急写错了，本次考试凉凉。 事实上只有30%的数据模数为质数 那么模数不是质数该怎么办呢？可以使用ExLucas. 首先给出了每一个质因子次数为1，这太好了（ 我们先把模数质因数分解，用每个质因数作为模数计算一个答案。最后使用CRT合并答案。 答案的式子是可以化成$ rac{T!}{a!b!c!*d!}$的，但这玩意求不了。。。还是用组合形式，每次预处理出1到$min(T, prime[i])$的阶乘，用Lucas求。 记得多取模 可以判一下非法情况，当T和(n + m)奇偶性不同时无解然而数据并没有无解的情况 要不再证一下CRT数学苦手今天好惨 CRT用来求解一组由形如$x_i \equiv a_i \mod m_i$组成的线性同余方程组。 我们使用构造的方法得到解： 我们设$M = \prod \limits_{i = 1}^{n} m_i$，$t_i =  rac{M}{m_i} $即，M是所有$m_i$的最小公倍数，t是除$m_i$外所有模数的乘积。 现在我们要为每个方程找一个$y_i$，使得$y_i \equiv 0 \mod m_k, k != i, y_i \equiv 1 \mod m_i$.第一个式子使得乘$y_i$对其他方程没有影响，第二个式子使得$y_i * a_i \equiv a_i \mod m_i$. 由第一个式子，$y_i = t_i QAQ$. 由第二个式子，$t_i QAQ \equiv 1 \mod m_i$,即$QAQ$是$t_i$在模$m_i$意义下的乘法逆元。 所以，最后$x = \prod \limits_{i = 1}^n a_i t_i t_i ^ {-1}$. 考试时真没想到要CRT，我还是Too young，需要学习一个 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define ll long longconst int N = 100233;ll T, mod, n, m, a, b, c, d, fac[N], pri[N], ans[N];ll Qpow(ll x, int b, ll p) { ll ret = 1; for (; b; b >>= 1, x = x * x % p) if (b & 1) ret = ret * x % p; return ret;}ll CRT() { ll ret = 0, lcm = 1; for (int i = 1; i <= pri[0]; i++) lcm *= pri[i]; for (int i = 1; i <= pri[0]; i++) { ll t = lcm / pri[i]; ret = (ret + t * ans[i] * Qpow(t, pri[i] - 2, pri[i])) % lcm; } return (ret + lcm) % lcm;}ll C(ll n, ll m, ll p) { if (m > n) return 0; if (n == 0 || m == n) return 1; return fac[n] * Qpow(fac[m], p - 2, p) % p * Qpow(fac[n - m], p - 2, p) % p;}ll Lucas(ll n, ll m, ll p) { return m == 0 ? 1 : C(n % p, m % p, p) * Lucas(n / p, m / p, p) % p;}void init(int id) { fac[1] = fac[0] = 1; for (int i = 2; i <= std::min(T, pri[id]); i++) fac[i] = fac[i - 1] * i % pri[id];}void GG() { puts("0"); exit(0);}signed main() { scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld", &T, &mod, &n, &m); n = abs(n), m = abs(m); if ((T & 1) != ((n + m) & 1) || T < (n + m)) GG(); ll tmp = mod; for (int i = 2; i * i <= mod; i++) if (tmp % i == 0) pri[++pri[0]] = i, tmp /= i; if (tmp > 1) pri[++pri[0]] = tmp; for (int i = 1; i <= pri[0]; i++) { init(i); for (int j = m; j <= T; j++) { a = j, b = a - m, c = (T + m + n - 2 * a) / 2, d = c - n; if (d < 0) break; ans[i] = (ans[i] + Lucas(T, a, pri[i]) % pri[i] * Lucas(T - a, b, pri[i]) % pri[i] * Lucas(T - a - b, c, pri[i]) % pri[i]) % pri[i]; } } printf("%lld
", CRT()); return 0;} T3:光考试的时候看都没看，GG。 一看就有一个很显然的60分暴力： 写一个while(1)的死循环，开个vis[][][]记录到过的格子、方向，到了到过的格子且方向相同就跳出循环。 把反射和移动都放到一堆数组里，这样省得判断。 作为附中压行之王，我坚信我是附中最短传说。 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, k, xs, ys, dir, ans;const int dy[] = {0, -1, -1, 1, 1}, dx[] = {0, -1, 1, 1, -1}, r1[] = {0, 2, 1, 4, 3}, r2[] = {0, 4, 3, 2, 1}, r3[] = {0, 3, 4, 1, 2};bool wall[1005][1005], vis[1005][1005][6];char ds[5];signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &k); if (n > 1000 || m > 1000) {printf("%lld
", (long long) n * m); return 0;} for (int i = 1, x, y; i <= k; i++) scanf("%d%d", &x, &y), wall[x][y] = 1; scanf("%d%d%s", &xs, &ys, ds); dir = ds[0] == 'N' ? ds[1] == 'E' ? 2 : 1 : ds[1] == 'E' ? 3 : 4; for (int i = 0; i <= n + 1; i++) wall[i][0] = wall[i][m + 1] = 1; for (int i = 0; i <= m + 1; i++) wall[0][i] = wall[n + 1][i] = 1; while (1) { if (vis[xs][ys][dir]) break; vis[xs][ys][dir] = 1; int xx = xs + dx[dir], yy = ys + dy[dir]; if (!wall[xx][yy]) {xs = xx, ys = yy; continue;} //撞不到 if (wall[xx][ys] && !wall[xs][yy]) {dir = r1[dir], ys = yy; continue;} //撞墙 if (!wall[xx][ys] && wall[xs][yy]) {dir = r2[dir], xs = xx; continue;} if (wall[xx][ys] && wall[xs][yy]) {dir = r3[dir]; continue;} //撞到角了 dir = r3[dir]; } for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) if (vis[i][j][1] || vis[i][j][2] || vis[i][j][3] || vis[i][j][4]) ans++; printf("%d
", ans); return 0;} 正解doc看不懂，向郭老师学习。正解就是个优化过的暴力。。。。。 首先图肯定不能开个二维数组存，不然你必死（ 光线肯定走几条斜线，观察图可以发现性质，两种斜线分别x+y相同或x-y相同。于是开一堆vector，往每个vector仍每条斜线上的障碍物的x。 然后大力模拟，走的时候不用一步一步走了，直接upper_bound.这就是正解优化的地方，从一步一步走到走很多步。。。 关于结束的问题，有一个很简单的思路。可以先让光线走一次，从第一个障碍物那里开始模拟，第二次到这个障碍物便是走了一圈了。 特别的，如果180度反弹，直接跳出递归，反方向找。 我觉得我还是蛮短的。作为附中压行之王，我坚信我即使不是附中最短传说，也是附中次短传说。 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, m, k, xs, ys, dir, start_x, start_y, vised;long long ans; bool ret;const int N = 100233, dy[] = {0, -1, -1, 1, 1}, dx[] = {0, 1, -1, 1, -1};int r1[] = {0, 2, 1, 4, 3}, r2[] = {0, 3, 4, 1, 2}, r3[] = {0, 4, 3, 2, 1};std::vector<int> l1[N<<1], l2[N<<2]; //l1:"/", l2:""char ds[5];void Rush(int x, int y, int dir) { int tmp = 0; switch (dir) { case 1: tmp = std::upper_bound(l1[x+y].begin(), l1[x+y].end(), x) - l1[x+y].begin(); xs = l1[x+y][tmp], ys = x + y - xs; ans += xs - x; break; case 2: tmp = std::upper_bound(l2[x-y+N].begin(), l2[x-y+N].end(), x) - l2[x-y+N].begin(); xs = l2[x-y+N][tmp-1], ys = xs - x + y; ans += x - xs; break; case 3: tmp = std::upper_bound(l2[x-y+N].begin(), l2[x-y+N].end(), x) - l2[x-y+N].begin(); xs = l2[x-y+N][tmp], ys = xs - x + y; ans += xs - x; break; case 4: tmp = std::upper_bound(l1[x+y].begin(), l1[x+y].end(), x) - l1[x+y].begin(); xs = l1[x+y][tmp-1], ys = x + y - xs; ans += x - xs; break; }}bool is_banned(int x, int y) { int tmp = std::lower_bound(l1[x+y].begin(), l1[x+y].end(), x) - l1[x+y].begin(); return l1[x+y][tmp] == x;}void Move(int x, int y, int d) { if (x == start_x && y == start_y && ++vised > 1) return; Rush(x, y, d); if (is_banned(xs, ys-dy[d]) ^ is_banned(xs-dx[d], ys)) { if (is_banned(xs, ys-dy[d])) Move(xs - dx[d], ys, r1[d]); else Move(xs, ys - dy[d], r2[d]); } else ret = 1;}void Add(int x, int y) { l1[x+y].push_back(x), l2[x-y+N].push_back(x);}signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &k); for (int i = 1, x, y; i <= k; i++) scanf("%d%d", &x, &y), l1[x+y].push_back(x), l2[x-y+N].push_back(x); scanf("%d%d%s", &start_x, &start_y, ds); dir = ds[0] == 'N' ? ds[1] == 'E' ? 1 : 2 : ds[1] == 'E' ? 3 : 4; for (int i = 0; i <= n + 1; i++) Add(i, 0), Add(i, m + 1); for (int i = 0; i <= m + 1; i++) Add(0, i), Add(n + 1, i); for (int i = 0; i <= n + m + 2; i++) std::sort(l1[i].begin(), l1[i].end()); for (int i = N - m - 1; i <= N + n + 1; i++) std::sort(l2[i].begin(), l2[i].end()); Rush(start_x, start_y, dir); if (is_banned(xs, ys-dy[dir]) ^ is_banned(xs-dx[dir], ys)) { if (is_banned(xs, ys-dy[dir])) start_x = xs - dx[dir], start_y = ys, dir = r1[dir]; else start_x = xs, start_y = ys - dy[dir], dir = r2[dir]; } else start_x = xs - dx[dir], start_y = ys - dy[dir], dir = r3[dir]; ans = 0; Move(start_x, start_y, dir); if (ret) vised = 0, Move(start_x, start_y, r3[dir]), --ans; printf("%lld
", ans); return 0;} 总结这次考试最大一个问题就是忘了数学那一堆公式。。。。血淋淋的教训告诉我们死记是不会有好的江来的（ 还是要自己证明定理，不然必忘 还有一个问题，调不出来题就先把暴力打了看看下一个，别吊死在一棵树上，最后还没调出来，树倒了。。。。

posts.title: Luogu P2886 [USACO07NOV] Cow Relays
posts.text: 矩阵乘法 f[k][i][j]表示从i到j走k步的最短路，显然得到一个转移方程：$f[k][i][j] = min(f[k - 1][i][t] + a[t][i])$. 这就是一个矩阵乘法的形式，本质上就是邻接矩阵的k次幂，只不过乘法过程中的相加变成了取min。 代码： 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839#include <bits/stdc++.h>int n, t, s, e, d[10005], cnt;struct Matrix { int a[105][105]; Matrix() { memset(a, 0x3f, sizeof(a)); } friend Matrix operator *(Matrix a, Matrix b) { Matrix c; for (int k = 1; k <= cnt; k++) for (int i = 1; i <= cnt; i++) for (int j = 1; j <= cnt; j++) c.a[i][j] = std::min(a.a[i][k] + b.a[k][j], c.a[i][j]); return c; }}x;Matrix qpow(Matrix m, int b) { Matrix t = m; for (; b; b >>= 1, m = m * m) if (b & 1) t = t * m; return t;}signed main() { scanf("%d%d%d%d", &n, &t, &s, &e); for (int i = 1; i <= t; i++) { int u, v, l; scanf("%d%d%d", &l, &u, &v); if (!d[u]) d[u] = ++cnt; if (!d[v]) d[v] = ++cnt; u = d[u], v = d[v]; x.a[u][v] = x.a[v][u] = std::min(x.a[u][v], l); } s = d[s], e = d[e]; Matrix ans = qpow(x, n - 1); printf("%d\n", ans.a[s][e]); return 0;}

posts.title: BZOJ 3590 [SNOI 2013] Quare
posts.text: 这和Tarjan有什么关系？为什么在Tarjan专题? 思路：选出无向图中包含所有点的权值和最小的双连通子图。 完全没思路，看了题解才会。。。。。 首先有一条重要的性质：一个双连通图可以拆成一个小双连通图和一条链。 我们首先能想到状压，用集合S表示点集。 那么设f[S]表示点集S构成的双连通图的最小权值和。 此题最大的思维难点来力：再预处理出两个数组g[S][i][j], h[S][i][1/0]. 其中数组g表示以i、j为链端点，链的点集为S，这条链的最小权值。数组h表示从点i到点集S的最短边和次短边。 我们为什么要求这两个数组？由上文性质可以想到状态的转移，一个点集S是从一个更小的点集T和一条链转移来的。而这条链汇入点集T时有两种情况：1.链只有一个点。那么链与T的两条连边就是这个点到T的最小边和次小边。2.链不止一个点，那么连边就是两个端点与T的最小边。 我还没写过这么长的状压DP。。。。。 代码：12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364#include <bits/stdc++.h>int mx, n, m, t, ecnt, head[15], f[1 << 13], g[1 << 13][13][13], h[1 << 13][13][3], bin[13], cnt[1 << 13];struct Edge {int to, nxt, val;} e[233333];inline void AddEdge(int f, int to, int val) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f], val}, head[f] = ecnt;}signed main() { scanf("%d", &t); for (int i = 1; i < 13; i++) bin[i] = (1 << (i - 1)); for (int i = 1; i < (1 << 13); i++) cnt[i] = cnt[i >> 1] + (i & 1); while (t--) { memset(g, 0x10, sizeof(g)); memset(h, 0x10, sizeof(h)); memset(f, 0x10, sizeof(f)); memset(head, 0, sizeof(head)); scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); mx = (1 << n) - 1; for (int i = 1, x, y, z; i <= m; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &z); AddEdge(x, y, z), AddEdge(y, x, z); } for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) g[bin[i]][i][i] = 0; for (int x = 1; x <= n; x++) for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) g[bin[x] | bin[y]][x][y] = std::min(g[bin[x] | bin[y]][x][y], e[i].val); for (int S = 1; S <= mx; S++) for (int x = 1; x <= n; x++) for (int y = 1; y <= n; y++) if ((bin[x] & S) && (bin[y] & S)) for (int i = head[y], z = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, z = e[i].to) if (!(bin[z] & S)) g[S | bin[z]][x][z] = std::min(g[S | bin[z]][x][z], g[S][x][y] + e[i].val); for (int S = 1; S <= mx; S++) for (int x = 1; x <= n; x++) if (!(S & bin[x])) for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) if (S & bin[y]) { if (e[i].val <= h[S][x][0]) h[S][x][1] = h[S][x][0], h[S][x][0] = e[i].val; else if (e[i].val < h[S][x][1]) h[S][x][1] = e[i].val; } for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) f[bin[i]] = 0; for (int D = 1; D <= mx; D++) if (cnt[D] >= 2) for (int S = (D - 1) & D, T = D - S; S; S = (S - 1) & D, T = D - S) for (int x = 1; x <= n; x++) for (int y = 1; y <= n; y++) if ((S & bin[x]) && (S & bin[y])) { if (x == y) f[D] = std::min(f[D], f[T] + g[S][x][x] + h[T][x][0] + h[T][x][1]); else f[D] = std::min(f[D], f[T] + g[S][x][y] + h[T][x][0] + h[T][y][0]); } if (f[mx] >= 0x10101010) puts("impossible"); else printf("%d\n", f[mx]); } return 0;}

posts.title: LOJ 2587 「APIO2018」铁人两项
posts.text: 据说是圆方树模板题,但我卡了好久（ 开幕感谢学姐Labelray教我这道题（祝她NOI Day2翻盘 本题要找一个三元组<s, c, f>，自然可以想到枚举端点s、f，求有几个中间点，也就是sf所在路径上有几个点。这个过程可以理解为在许多个BCC间走动，也就是在圆方树的方点间走动。 我们把方点的权值设为BCC的大小，方案数就是x到y路径上点的权值和。我们把圆点的权值设为-1，因为它们可能在多个BCC中出现，会重复统计。最后问题转化为求树上任意两点间距离权值和，这是一个树形DP的问题，当然我们也可以不DP，考虑每个点的贡献。 首先要注意的是所有点不一定联通，这可能是一个圆方树森林。因此我们每Tarjan完一次就来求一次答案。 我们设siz[x]为以x为根节点子树有多少圆点。有两种路径，一种是在x子树内两个点经过i，另一种是x子树内一个点与子树外一个点经过点x。 我们再设：y为x子树的根节点，tot为整棵圆方树的圆点数。需要注意的一点是这里的siz[x]是每处理一棵子树再加上去的，是截至目前已经处理过的x子树圆点数。 对于第一种，每个y对答案的贡献为siz[x] * siz[y] * val[x]。对于第二种，x的贡献为siz[x] * (num - siz[x]) * val[x]。这里的siz[x]已经处理完了。 注意只有ans开long long是不行的，右边也要强制转换。 代码：123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 200233;struct Edge {int to, nxt;} e[N << 1], c[N << 1];int head[N], hc[N], ecnt, ccnt, n, m, val[N], siz[N];long long ans;inline void AddEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}inline void AddC(int f, int to) { c[++ccnt] = {to, hc[f]}, hc[f] = ccnt;}int dfn[N], low[N], stk[N], num, p, tot;void Tarjan(int x) { dfn[x] = low[x] = ++num, stk[++p] = x; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (!dfn[y]) { Tarjan(y), low[x] = std::min(low[x], low[y]); if (low[y] >= dfn[x]) { AddC(++tot, x), AddC(x, tot); int z; val[tot]++; do { z = stk[p--], AddC(tot, z), AddC(z, tot), val[tot]++; } while (y != z); } } else low[x] = std::min(low[x], dfn[y]); }}void dfs(int x, int fa) { if (x <= n) siz[x] = 1; for (int i = hc[x], y = c[i].to; i; i = c[i].nxt, y = c[i].to) if (y != fa) dfs(y, x), ans += 1LL * siz[x] * siz[y] * val[x], siz[x] += siz[y]; ans += 1LL * siz[x] * (num - siz[x]) * val[x];} signed main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); for (int i = 1, x, y; i <= m; i++) { scanf("%d%d", &x, &y); AddEdge(x, y), AddEdge(y, x); } tot = n; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) val[i] = -1; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) if (!dfn[i]) num = 0, Tarjan(i), dfs(i, 0); return !printf("%lld\n", ans << 1);}

posts.title: LOJ 2311「ZJOI2006」物流运输
posts.text: 神题。跪了 思路：这题图论DP结合，绝了 用Dijkstra预处理第i天到第j天从A到B的最短路dis[i][j]，每次ban掉被封锁的码头。 第i天最小成本f[i] = min(f[j] + dis[j + 1][i] * ()) 代码：1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 23333;struct Edge {int to, nxt, d;} e[N << 1];int ecnt, head[N], n, m, k, t, f[233], dis[233], dis_to_m[233][233], tim;bool ins[N], ban[50][200];void AddEdge(int f, int to,int d) { e[++ecnt] = (Edge) {to, head[f], d}, head[f] = ecnt;}bool check(int x, int l, int r) { for (int i = l; i <= r; i++) if (ban[x][i]) return 0; return 1;}int Dijkstra(int l, int r) { memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof(dis)); memset(ins, 0, sizeof(ins)); std::priority_queue<std::pair<int, int> > q; dis[1] = 0; q.push(std::make_pair(0, 1)); while (q.size()) { int x = q.top().second; q.pop(); if (ins[x]) continue; ins[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (dis[y] > dis[x] + e[i].d && check(y, l, r)) { dis[y] = dis[x] + e[i].d; if (!ins[y]) q.push(std::make_pair(-dis[y], y)); } } } return dis[m];}signed main() { std::ios::sync_with_stdio(0); std::cin >> n >> m >> k >> t; for (int i = 1, x, y, z; i <= t; i++) { std::cin >> x >> y >> z; AddEdge(x, y, z), AddEdge(y, x, z); } std::cin >> t; for (int i = 1, p, a, b; i <= t; i++) { std::cin >> p >> a >> b; for (int i = a; i <= b; i++) ban[p][i] = 1; } for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++) dis_to_m[j][i] = Dijkstra(j, i); memset(f, 0x3f, sizeof(f)); f[0] = -k; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) if (dis_to_m[j + 1][i] != 0x3f3f3f3f) f[i] = std::min(f[j] + dis_to_m[j + 1][i] * (i - j) + k, f[i]); std::cout << f[n] << "\n"; return 0;}

posts.title: BZOJ 3331 [BeiJing2013] 压力
posts.text: 圆方树真好用.jpg 思路:显然,每个BCC对答案的贡献为0.因此考虑缩点,但BCC…. 有一种好的数据结构-圆方树! 入门戳这里 圆方树YES 最后只需要统计经过每个圆点的路径数,考虑树上差分.在路径两端点++,LCA–,fa[LCA]–,最后dfs统计. LCA我选择树剖.(因为无脑 代码:123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 400233;int n, m, q, ecnt, ccnt, p, num, tot, head[N], hc[N], dfn[N], low[N], stk[N], ans[N], delta[N];struct Edge {int to, nxt;} e[N << 1], c[N << 1];inline void AddEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = (Edge) {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}inline void AddC(int f, int to) { c[++ccnt] = (Edge) {to, hc[f]}, hc[f] = ccnt;}void Tarjan(int x) { dfn[x] = low[x] = ++num, stk[++p] = x; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (!dfn[y]) { Tarjan(y), low[x] = std::min(low[x], low[y]); if (low[y] >= dfn[x]) { AddC(++tot, x), AddC(x, tot); int z; do { z = stk[p--], AddC(tot, z), AddC(z, tot); } while (y != z); } } else low[x] = std::min(low[x], dfn[y]); }}int fa[N], dep[N], siz[N], tp[N], son[N];void dfs1(int x, int f) { fa[x] = f, dep[x] = dep[f] + 1, siz[x] = 1; for (int i = hc[x], y = c[i].to; i; i = c[i].nxt, y = c[i].to) { if (y != f) { dfs1(y, x), siz[x] += siz[y]; if (siz[y] > siz[son[x]]) son[x] = y; } }}void dfs2(int x, int tpp) { tp[x] = tpp; if (!son[x]) return; dfs2(son[x], tpp); for (int i = hc[x], y = c[i].to; i; i = c[i].nxt, y = c[i].to) if (y != fa[x] && y != son[x]) dfs2(y, y);}int GetLCA(int x, int y) { while (tp[x] != tp[y]) { if (dep[tp[x]] < dep[tp[y]]) y = fa[tp[y]]; else x = fa[tp[x]]; } return dep[x] < dep[y] ? x : y;}void dfs(int x) { for (int i = hc[x], y = c[i].to; i; i = c[i].nxt, y = c[i].to) if (y != fa[x]) dfs(y), delta[x] += delta[y];}signed main() { std::ios::sync_with_stdio(0); std::cin >> n >> m >> q; for (int i = 1, x, y; i <= m; i++) std::cin >> x >> y, AddEdge(x, y), AddEdge(y, x); tot = n; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) if (!dfn[i]) Tarjan(i); dfs1(1, 0), dfs2(1, 1); while (q--) { int x, y; std::cin >> x >> y; int lca = GetLCA(x, y); ++delta[x], ++delta[y], --delta[lca], --delta[fa[lca]]; } dfs(1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) std::cout << delta[i] << "\n"; return 0;}

posts.title: LOJ 2255 [SNOI 2017] 炸弹
posts.text: 简化了的线段树优化建图 思路:一个炸弹炸的范围是一个区间,考虑线段树优化建图. 这道题是一个点向一个区间连边,就只需要建一棵线段树了. 建一棵线段树,从上向下连节点.当我们需要用炸弹向爆炸区间连边时,我们从它所对应的线段树叶子节点向线段树的区间连边 对于可以互相炸到的炸弹,我们可以跑一边Tarjan缩个点,方便统计. 统计理论上应该用拓扑,但我脑抽了写了个dfs( 代码:12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485868788899091#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define ll long longconst int N = 5002333, MO = 1000000007;struct Edge {int to, nxt;} e[N << 3], c[N << 3];struct SegTree { int l, r, ls, rs;} t[N << 2];int head[N], ecnt, ccnt, hc[N], tot, pos[N], n, root, f[N], ans, vis[N], tim, cnt;ll x[N], r[N];void AddEdge(int f, int to) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f]}, head[f] = ecnt;}void AddC(int f, int to) { c[++ccnt] = {to, hc[f]}, hc[f] = ccnt;}void Build(int &p, int l, int r) { p = ++tot, t[p].l = l, t[p].r = r; if (l == r) {pos[l] = p; return;} int mid = (l + r) >> 1; Build(t[p].ls, l, mid), Build(t[p].rs, mid + 1, r); AddEdge(p, t[p].ls), AddEdge(p, t[p].rs);}void Link(int p, int l, int r, int v) { if (t[p].l >= l && t[p].r <= r) { if (pos[v] == p) return; AddEdge(pos[v], p); return; } int mid = (t[p].l + t[p].r) >> 1; if (l <= mid) Link(t[p].ls, l, r, v); if (r > mid) Link(t[p].rs, l, r, v);}int dfn[N], low[N], stk[N], id[N], siz[N], p, num, scc;bool ins[N];void Tarjan(int x) { dfn[x] = low[x] = ++num; stk[++p] = x, ins[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (!dfn[y]) { Tarjan(y), low[x] = std::min(low[x], low[y]); } else if (ins[y]) low[x] = std::min(low[x], dfn[y]); } if (low[x] == dfn[x]) { ++scc; int z; do { z = stk[p--], ins[z] = 0, id[z] = scc; } while (x != z); }}void dfs(int x) { vis[x] = tim, cnt += siz[x]; for (int i = hc[x], y = c[i].to; i; i = c[i].nxt, y = c[i].to) if (vis[y] != tim) vis[y] = tim, dfs(y);}int Solve(int x) { x = id[pos[x]]; if (f[x]) return f[x]; tim++, cnt = 0; dfs(x); return f[x] = cnt;}signed main() { scanf("%d", &n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%lld%lld", &x[i], &r[i]); Build(root, 1, n); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { int L = std::lower_bound(x + 1, x + 1 + n, x[i] - r[i]) - x; int R = std::upper_bound(x + 1, x + 1 + n, x[i] + r[i]) - x - 1; Link(1, L, R, i); } for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) if (!dfn[pos[i]]) Tarjan(pos[i]); for (int x = 1; x <= tot; x++) for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) if (id[x] != id[y]) AddC(id[x], id[y]); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) siz[id[pos[i]]]++; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) (ans += (long long) i * (long long) Solve(i) % MO) %= MO; return !printf("%d\n", ans);}

posts.title: BZOJ 3073 Journeys
posts.text: 线段树优化建图 思路:$N\le 500000$,暴力建图$N^2$瞬间暴死,GG. 可以发现都是区间向区间连边,这里就可以用线段树优化建图. 线段树只需要连最多nlogn条边就可以建图,你必活(逃 具体的做法: 建两棵线段树,1号线段树儿子向爸爸连边,作为入点, 0号线段树爸爸向儿子连边,作为出点.0号线段树的每个叶子再向1号线段树对应叶子连边.需要加边时, 从1号线段树对应区间连一个虚点.虚点再连向0号线段树的对应节点. 可以自己手画两棵线段树出来模拟一下,理解一下这么连为什么是对的( 这道题要求最短路,还需要考虑一下边权的问题.除1号线段树与虚点连边的边权为1外,其他边权都为0.这要才能保证每个区间间的路径权为1. 跑最短路时以p节点所对应1号线段树中叶子节点为起点,跑堆优化Dijkstra. 代码:1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283848586878889909192939495#include <bits/stdc++.h>inline int Read() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}const int N = 3000005;struct Edge {int to, nxt, val;} e[N << 3];struct SegTree { int ls, rs, l, r;} tr[N];int head[N], ecnt, tot, pos[N], n, m, p, root_0, root_1;void AddEdge(int f, int to, int val) { e[++ecnt] = (Edge) {to, head[f], val}, head[f] = ecnt;}void Build(int &p, int l, int r, int opt) { p = ++tot, tr[p].l = l, tr[p].r = r; if (l == r) { if (opt) pos[l] = p; //这里记住1号线段树的叶子位置,之后都用得到 return; } int mid = (l + r) >> 1; Build(tr[p].ls, l, mid, opt), Build(tr[p].rs, mid + 1, r, opt); if (opt) AddEdge(tr[p].ls, p, 0), AddEdge(tr[p].rs, p, 0); else AddEdge(p, tr[p].ls, 0), AddEdge(p, tr[p].rs, 0);}void ConnectTheLeaves(int p) { if (tr[p].l == tr[p].r) { AddEdge(p, pos[tr[p].l], 0); return; } ConnectTheLeaves(tr[p].ls); ConnectTheLeaves(tr[p].rs);} /*这个函数就是连接树与虚点了.opt为0表示从虚点向0号线段树连边,1相反.*/void AddOnTree(int p, int l, int r, int v, int opt) { if (tr[p].l >= l && tr[p].r <= r) { if (opt) AddEdge(p, v, 1); else AddEdge(v, p, 0); return; } int mid = (tr[p].l + tr[p].r) >> 1; if (l <= mid) AddOnTree(tr[p].ls, l, r, v, opt); if (r > mid) AddOnTree(tr[p].rs, l, r, v, opt);}void Add(int l_1, int r_1, int l_2, int r_2) { AddOnTree(root_1, l_1, r_1, ++tot, 1); AddOnTree(root_0, l_2, r_2, tot, 0);}int dis[N];bool vis[N];void Dijkstra() { memset(dis, 0x3f, sizeof(dis)); std::priority_queue<std::pair<int, int> > q; dis[pos[p]] = 0; q.push(std::make_pair(0, pos[p])); while (q.size()) { int x = q.top().second; q.pop(); if (vis[x]) continue; vis[x] = 1; for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (dis[y] > dis[x] + e[i].val) { dis[y] = dis[x] + e[i].val; if (!vis[y]) q.push(std::make_pair(-dis[y], y)); } } }}signed main() { n = Read(), m = Read(), p = Read(); Build(root_1, 1, n, 1), Build(root_0, 1, n, 0), ConnectTheLeaves(root_0); for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) { int a = Read(), b = Read(), c = Read(), d = Read(); Add(a, b, c, d), Add(c, d, a, b); } Dijkstra(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) std::cout << dis[pos[i]] << "\n"; return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P2015 二叉苹果树
posts.text: 树形DP蒟蒻.jpg 思路:蒟蒻树形DP没学好,最近从头开始重学(捂脸 树形DP设计状态的重要方法是f[i][j]i表示以i为根子树,j按照所求去设计. 而转移状态主要就是从儿子向爸爸转移. 回到本题,设f[x][i]为以x为根的子树中保留树枝数量为i的最多苹果数. 状态转移方程:$f[x][i] = max(f[x][i - k] + f[y][k])$. dfs时注意一下对根节点的特判. 代码:123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 233;struct Edge {int to, nxt, val;} e[N << 1];int n, q, f[N][N], head[N], ecnt;inline void AddEdge(int f, int to, int val) { e[++ecnt] = {to, head[f], val}, head[f] = ecnt;}void dfs(int x, int fa) { for (int i = head[x], y = e[i].to; i; i = e[i].nxt, y = e[i].to) { if (y == fa) continue; f[y][1] = e[i].val; dfs(y, x); for (int j = q; j >= 1; j--) for (int k = 0; k <= j; k++) if ((j != 1 && k != j) || x == 1) f[x][j] = std::max(f[x][j], f[x][j - k] + f[y][k]); }}signed main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &q); for (int i = 1, x, y, z; i < n; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &z); AddEdge(x, y, z), AddEdge(y, x, z); } dfs(1, 0); return !printf("%d\n", f[1][q]);}
