posts.title: BZOJ 3033 太鼓达人
posts.text: dfs神题（不 思路:当时看题属实懵逼 第一问很简单，每个位置01两种，最后答案$2^k$. 第二问我很好骑。。。是要求所有01串首尾相连形成串的最小值 数据范围又不大，显然起点是全0的串，dfs就完事了（ 最后查了题解，我们其实可以把k-1位的串看成节点，k位串看成边去建图，由于每个点入度等于出度，这是一个欧拉图。 以全0节点为起点，优先走字典序小的边，找欧拉回路，这是正解（ 代码：1234567891011121314151617181920212223#include <bits/stdc++.h>int k, m, ans[(1 << 12)];bool vis[(1 << 12)];bool dfs(int x, int k) { if (vis[x]) return 0; if (k == m) return 1; vis[x] = 1; ans[k] = x & 1; if (dfs((x << 1) & (m - 1), k + 1)) return 1; if (dfs(((x << 1) | 1) & (m - 1), k + 1)) return 1; return 0;}signed main() { std::cin >> k; std::cout << (m = (1 << k)) << " "; dfs(0, 1); for (int i = 1; i <= k - 1; i++) std::cout << "0"; for (int i = 1; i <= m - k + 1; i++) std::cout << ans[i]; std::cout << "\n"; return 0;}

posts.title: BZOJ 2791 [POI2012] Rendezvous
posts.text:
真实毒瘤题 思路:显然,最后建图结果是一个内向基环树森林 这题就是要大力分类讨论。。。 如果两个点不在同一棵树上，无解，输出-1 -1 如果在同一棵树上，再判断两个点是否都在同一棵子树里。 如果在同一棵子树，我们可以直接求LCA。 如果不在同一棵子树上，我们需要先令两个点都走到环上，最后的答案一定是从一个点走到另一个点路径的较小值。 写这种毒瘤题好烦啊（（（ 代码：12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 500000 + 2333;int n, k, tot, tp, cnt, fa[N][21], color[N], root[N], dep[N], stack[N], siz[N], id[N];bool on_circle[N], vis[N], ins[N];inline int R() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}void dfs(int x) { stack[++tp] = x, vis[x] = ins[x] = 1; int f = fa[x][0]; if (ins[f]) { int tmp = 0; color[f] = ++cnt, on_circle[f] = 1, fa[f][0] = 0, root[f] = f, id[f] = tmp; for (int i = tp; stack[i] != f; i--) { on_circle[stack[i]] = 1, color[stack[i]] = cnt, id[stack[i]] = ++tmp; root[stack[i]] = stack[i], fa[stack[i]][0] = 0; } siz[cnt] = tmp + 1, ins[x] = 0; return; } else { if (!vis[f]) dfs(f); ins[x] = 0; if (on_circle[x]) return; color[x] = color[f], dep[x] = dep[f] + 1, root[x] = root[f]; for (int i = 1; i <= 20; i++) fa[x][i] = fa[ fa[x][i - 1] ][i - 1]; }}int LCA(int a, int b){ if (dep[a] > dep[b]) std::swap(a, b); for (int i = 20; i >= 0; --i) if (dep[a] <= dep[b] - (1 << i)) b = fa[b][i]; if (a == b) return a; for (int i = 20; i >= 0; --i) if (fa[a][i] != fa[b][i]) a = fa[a][i], b = fa[b][i]; return fa[a][0];}signed main() { n = R(), k = R(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) fa[i][0] = R(); for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) if (!vis[i]) tp = 0, dfs(i); while (k--) { int a, b, x, y; a = R(), b = R(); if (color[a] != color[b]) { puts("-1 -1"); continue; } if (root[a] == root[b]) { int lca = LCA(a, b); x = dep[a] - dep[lca], y = dep[b] - dep[lca]; printf("%d %d
", x, y); } else { x = dep[a], y = dep[b], a = root[a], b = root[b], tot = siz[color[a]]; int x_1 = x + (id[a] - id[b] + tot) % tot, y_1 = y; int x_2 = x, y_2 = y + (id[b] - id[a] + tot) % tot; int max_1 = std::max(x_1, y_1), max_2 = std::max(x_2, y_2); int min_1 = std::min(x_1, y_1), min_2 = std::min(x_2, y_2); if (max_1 < max_2 || (max_1 == max_2 && min_1 < min_2) || (max_1 == max_2 && min_1 == min_2 && x_1 >= y_1)) printf("%d %d
", x_1, y_1); else printf("%d %d
", x_2, y_2); } } return 0;}

posts.title: BZOJ 2654 Tree
posts.text: 开 幕 雷 击 思路:看见要求”恰好”xxx就感到不可做((( 大体思路是先建一棵MST,然后再在它上面修改,使得这棵树有need条白边. 我们去用白边替换MST上的黑边肯定是布星的,改一次就要动一棵子树,难以保证权最小. 没有思路就上厕所((,突然有了一个idea,我们可以改白边的边权再生成MST,使得它的数量等于need. 显然改大了白边就少了,改小了白边就大了,似乎有单调性,珂以二分( 这二分好毒瘤啊,调了好几次 代码:1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 100000 + 233;struct Edge { int from, to, nxt, val, color; friend bool operator <(Edge a, Edge b) { return a.val != b.val ? a.val < b.val : a.color < b.color; }} e[N << 1];int ecnt, head[N], v, m, need, fa[N];void AddEdge(int f, int to, int val, int color) { e[++ecnt] = (Edge) {f, to, head[f], val, color}, head[f] = ecnt;}int get(int x) { return x == fa[x] ? x : fa[x] = get(fa[x]);}int check(int delta) { for (int i = 1; i <= v; i++) fa[i] = i; for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) if (!e[i].color) e[i].val += delta; int tot = 0, ans = 0; std::sort(e + 1, e + 1 + m); for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) { int x = e[i].from, y = e[i].to; if (get(x) != get(y)) { fa[get(x)] = get(y); if (!e[i].color) ++tot; ans += e[i].val; } } for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) if (!e[i].color) e[i].val -= delta; return tot >= need ? ans : -1;}signed main() { std::ios::sync_with_stdio(0); std::cin >> v >> m >> need; for (int i = 1, s, t, c, col; i <= m; i++) { std::cin >> s >> t >> c >> col; AddEdge(s + 1, t + 1, c, col); } int l = -300, r = 300, mid, ans = 0; while (l <= r) { mid = (l + r) >> 1; int tmp = check(mid); if (tmp != -1) ans = tmp - need * mid, l = mid + 1; else r = mid - 1; } std::cout << ans << "\n"; return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P1903 [国家集训队]数颜色 / 维护队列
posts.text:
带修莫队板子 Luogu P1903 [国家集训队]数颜色 / 维护队列 思路:区间题显然可以莫队,但这题多了一个修改. 因此就需要用到带修莫队. 带修莫队比起普通莫队多了修改指针的移动,我们记录一下每个询问区间需要进行几次修改,在需要修改时现用现改,如果改多了就往回改.其余与普通莫队一致. 代码:1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465#include <bits/stdc++.h>const int N = 1e6 + 233;int n, m, acnt, ccnt, color[N], block, kind, pos[N], cnt[N], ans[N];inline int R() { int a = 0; char c = getchar(); while (!isdigit(c)) c = getchar(); while (isdigit(c)) a = a * 10 + c - '0', c = getchar(); return a;}struct Ask { int l, r, pre, id; friend bool operator <(Ask a, Ask b) { if (pos[a.l] != pos[b.l]) return a.l < b.l; if (pos[a.r] != pos[b.r]) return a.r < b.r; return a.pre < b.pre; }} ask[N];struct Change { int p, c;} chg[N];inline void Add(int x) {if (++cnt[x] == 1) ++kind;}inline void Del(int x) {if (--cnt[x] == 0) --kind;}inline void CH(int now, int i) { if (chg[now].p <= ask[i].r && chg[now].p >= ask[i].l) { if (--cnt[color[chg[now].p]] == 0) --kind; if (++cnt[chg[now].c] == 1) ++kind; } std::swap(color[chg[now].p], chg[now].c);}signed main() { //int st = clock() / CLOCKS_PER_SEC; n = R(), m = R(); block = (int) pow(n, 0.66); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) color[i] = R(), pos[i] = (i - 1) / block + 1; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { char opt[5]; int a, b; scanf("%s", opt); a = R(), b = R(); if (opt[0] == 'Q') ask[++acnt].l = a, ask[acnt].r = b, ask[acnt].pre = ccnt, ask[acnt].id = acnt; else chg[++ccnt].p = a, chg[ccnt].c = b; } std::sort(ask + 1, ask + 1 + acnt); for (int i = 1, l = 1, r = 0, now = 0; i <= acnt; ++i) { while (l < ask[i].l) Del(color[l++]); while (l > ask[i].l) Add(color[--l]); while (r < ask[i].r) Add(color[++r]); while (r > ask[i].r) Del(color[r--]); while (now < ask[i].pre) CH(++now, i); while (now > ask[i].pre) CH(now--, i); ans[ask[i].id] = kind; } for (int i = 1; i <= acnt; ++i) printf("%d
", ans[i]); /*int ed = clock() / CLOCKS_PER_SEC; printf("
%d
", ed - st);*/ return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P4124 [CQOI2016]手机号码
posts.text: 挺难搞的数位DP,顺便总结一下 Luogu P4124 [CQOI2016]手机号码 思路:数位DP有递推和记搜两种写法,记搜好想好写. 套路还是比较明显,拆数dfs. 根据需要设计状态, dfs(int pos, int pre, bool lim, ......) 本题需要记录的状态就相当多..所以就记下来,都可以记. 吐槽一下,说好的一定是11位数,怎么数据还有不合法的???O_o 代码:123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define ll long longll L, R, dp[12][12][12][2][2][2];int dig[233], cnt;ll dfs(int pos, int pre1, int pre2, bool lim, bool eight, bool four, bool ok) { if (eight && four) return 0; if (!pos) return ok; if (!lim && dp[pos][pre1][pre2][eight][four][ok] != -1) return dp[pos][pre1][pre2][eight][four][ok]; int upper = lim ? dig[pos] : 9; ll ans = 0; for (int i = 0; i <= upper; i++) ans += dfs(pos - 1, i, pre1, lim && (i == upper), eight || (i == 8), four || (i == 4), ok || (i == pre1 && i == pre2)); if (!lim) dp[pos][pre1][pre2][eight][four][ok] = ans; return ans;}ll Solve(ll x) { cnt = 0; ll ret = 0; memset(dig, 0, sizeof(dig)); memset(dp, -1, sizeof(dp)); while (x) dig[++cnt] = x % 10, x /= 10; if (cnt != 11) return 0; for (int i = 1; i <= dig[cnt]; i++) ret += dfs(cnt - 1, i, 0, i == dig[cnt], i == 8, i == 4, 0); return ret;}signed main() { scanf("%lld%lld", &L, &R); printf("%lld", Solve(R) - Solve(L - 1)); return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P2590 [ZJOI2008]树的统计
posts.text: 挺难搞的数位DP,顺便总结一下 Luogu P4124 [CQOI2016]手机号码 思路:数位DP有递推和记搜两种写法,记搜好想好写. 套路还是比较明显,拆数dfs. 根据需要设计状态, dfs(int pos, int pre, bool lim, ......) 本题需要记录的状态就相当多..所以就记下来,都可以记. 吐槽一下,说好的一定是11位数,怎么数据还有不合法的???O_o 代码:123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define ll long longll L, R, dp[12][12][12][2][2][2];int dig[233], cnt;ll dfs(int pos, int pre1, int pre2, bool lim, bool eight, bool four, bool ok) { if (eight && four) return 0; if (!pos) return ok; if (!lim && dp[pos][pre1][pre2][eight][four][ok] != -1) return dp[pos][pre1][pre2][eight][four][ok]; int upper = lim ? dig[pos] : 9; ll ans = 0; for (int i = 0; i <= upper; i++) ans += dfs(pos - 1, i, pre1, lim && (i == upper), eight || (i == 8), four || (i == 4), ok || (i == pre1 && i == pre2)); if (!lim) dp[pos][pre1][pre2][eight][four][ok] = ans; return ans;}ll Solve(ll x) { cnt = 0; ll ret = 0; memset(dig, 0, sizeof(dig)); memset(dp, -1, sizeof(dp)); while (x) dig[++cnt] = x % 10, x /= 10; if (cnt != 11) return 0; for (int i = 1; i <= dig[cnt]; i++) ret += dfs(cnt - 1, i, 0, i == dig[cnt], i == 8, i == 4, 0); return ret;}signed main() { scanf("%lld%lld", &L, &R); printf("%lld", Solve(R) - Solve(L - 1)); return 0;}

posts.title: Luogu P5337 [TJOI2019]甲苯先生的字符串
posts.text: 省选矩阵乘法水题 Luogu P5337 [TJOI2019]甲苯先生的字符串 思路:我们首先可以得到一个显然的转移方程: $f[i][j]$表示写下长度为i字符串,最后一个字符为j的种类数. $f[i][j]=\sum f[i-1][k]$,若j与k可连. 我们把s1中相邻的字符预处理出来,$w[i][j]$表示i与j是否可连,可连为1不可连为0. 则$f[i][j]=\sum f[i-1][k]*w[k][j]$. 右半边这不就是矩阵乘法的展开形式嘛…… 用矩阵乘法搞一下就A了((( 代码:123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define ll long longconst int MO = 1e9 + 7;ll n, tot; int len; char s[100000 + 233];struct Matrix { ll a[35][35]; Matrix() { memset(a, 0, sizeof(a)); } friend Matrix operator *(Matrix a, Matrix b) { Matrix c; for (int i = 1; i <= 26; ++i) for(int j = 1; j <= 26; ++j) for (int k = 1; k <= 26; ++k) c.a[i][j] = (c.a[i][j] + a.a[i][k] * b.a[k][j]) % MO; return c; }} ans, e, ret, q;signed main() { scanf("%lld%s", &n, s + 1); len = strlen(s + 1); for (int i = 1; i <= 26; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= 26; ++j) e.a[i][j] = 1; for (int i = 1; i <= 26; ++i) ans.a[1][i] = 1, q.a[i][i] = 1; for (int i = 1; i < len; ++i) e.a[s[i] - 'a' + 1][s[i + 1] - 'a' + 1] = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= 26; ++i) ret.a[i][i] = 1; for (--n ; n; n >>= 1) { if (n & 1) q = q * e; e = e * e; } ans = ans * q; for (int i = 1; i <= 26; ++i) tot = (tot + ans.a[1][i]) % MO; return !printf("%lld\n", tot);}

posts.title: Luogu CF148D Bag of mice
posts.text: 期望DP 思路：学姐说记忆化搜索冗余状态少跑得快（ 主要都是分类讨论，懒得写了（ 代码：123456789101112131415161718192021#include <bits/stdc++.h>int w, b;double f[1005][1005];double dfs(int nw, int nb) { if (!nw) return 0.0; if (!nb) return 1.0; if (f[nw][nb]) return f[nw][nb]; double ret = (double) nw / (nw + nb); if (nb == 2) ret += (double) nb / (nw + nb) * (nb - 1) / (nw + nb - 1) * dfs(nw - 1, nb - 2); else if (nb >= 3) ret += (double) nb / (nw + nb) * (nb - 1) / (nw + nb - 1) * ((double) nw / (nw + nb - 2) * dfs(nw - 1, nb - 2) + (double) (nb - 2) / (nw + nb - 2) * dfs(nw, nb - 3)); return f[nw][nb] = ret;}signed main() { scanf("%d%d", &w, &b); return !printf("%.9lf\n", dfs(w, b));}

posts.title: Luogu P1291 [SHOI2002]百事世界杯之旅
posts.text:
期望DP入门题 思路：这题最大难点在输出格式，我佛了 代码：1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950#include <bits/stdc++.h>#define int long longint n;int gcd(int a, int b) { return b == 0 ? a : gcd(b, a % b);}struct frac { int p, q; friend frac operator +(const frac a, const frac b) { frac x; x.p = a.p * b.q + b.p * a.q, x.q = a.q * b.q; int g = gcd(x.p, x.q); x.p /= g, x.q /= g; return x; } void print() { if (p % q == 0) { printf("%lld
", p / q); return; } else { int g = gcd(p, q); p /= g, q /= g; int inte = p / q, t = q, qlen = 0, ilen = 0; p %= q; while (t) qlen++, t /= 10; t = inte; while (t) ilen++, t /= 10; for (int i = 1; i <= ilen; i++) printf(" "); printf("%lld
", p); printf("%lld", inte); for (int i = 1; i <= qlen; i++) printf("-"); putchar('
'); for (int i = 1; i <= ilen; i++) printf(" "); printf("%lld
", q); return; } }} ans, tmp;signed main() { scanf("%lld", &n); ans.p = ans.q = tmp.p = tmp.q = 1; for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) tmp.q = i, ans = ans + tmp; ans.p *= n; ans.print(); return 0;}
